If anything they want to hang out with you even more, because they realize you’re very discriminating with your time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On his morning routines: 1 hour meditation + 1 hour workout/yoga
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It’s easier to change yourself than to change the world
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We’re genetically wired to be pessimists, but modern society is far, far safer
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It made sense to be pessimistic in the past, but it makes sense to be an optimist today
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We just play games in life. You grow up, you’re playing the school game, you’re playing the social game. Then you’re playing the money game; then you’re playing the status game. These games just have longer and longer and longer-lived horizons. At some point, at least I believe that these are all just games. There are games where the outcome really stops mattering once you see through a game
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Your closest friends are the ones you can have a relationship with about nothing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Everything you’re a winner at now in your life, you were a once a loser at
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I wish I had done all of the same things but with less emotion and less anger
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t think life is that hard. I think we make it hard
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: To me happiness is not about positive thoughts. It’s not about negative thoughts. It’s about the absence of desire, especially the absence of desire for external things
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Desire is a contract that you make with yourself to be unhappy until you get what you want
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You can neither give happiness, nor receive it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A rational person can find peace by cultivating indifference to things outside of their control
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Real happiness only comes as a side-effect of peace. Most of it is going to come from acceptance, not from changing your external environment
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I, and I alone, am responsible for everything I think and feel
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t have a preconception of a perfect day, because if I did, then it would ruin the day that I was living
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: As you get older, you just realize that there’s no happiness in material possessions
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think a lot of us learn as we get older that happiness is internal
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Yoga cultivates Peace of Body. Meditation cultivates Peace of Mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Internal happiness is reward from being in flow. Create, meditate, love, play. Clears the mind and leaves us in peace
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Happiness is an internal trait that comes out of being peaceful and accepting of whatever is going on around you. It’s that sense that nothing is missing in this moment
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We are born with happiness, we are intrinsically happy creatures but we become unhappy because our egos create desire. The desire pulls us out of the moment. So something is missing right now then we chase that and we wonder why we are unhappy
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The success driven mentality drives you to unhappiness
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Every moment has to be complete in and of itself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You can very slowly but steadily and methodically improve your happiness baseline, just like you can improve your fitness
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 1. First time you saw a sunset, it was amazing. It was jaw-dropping. You forgot yourself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 2. The second time you saw it, it was cool. The hundredth time you see it, it’s nothing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 3. The thousandth time you’re seeing it, and someone shows you a sunset, you’re like, "Well, actually, I saw this one sunset in Mexico at this time that was really cool." You’re not even there
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Happiness is that state when nothing is missing. When nothing is missing, your mind shuts down and your mind stops running into the future or running into the past to regret something or to plan something
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you’re a peaceful person, anything you do will be a happy activity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Happiness to me is mainly not suffering, not desiring, not thinking too much about the future or the past, really embracing the present moment and the reality of what is, the way it is
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Caught in a funk? Use meditation, music, and exercise to reset your mood. Then choose a new path to commit emotional energy for rest of day
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: To me, peace is happiness at rest and happiness is peace in motion. You can convert peace to happiness anytime you want
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In today’s day and age, many people think you get peace by resolving all your external problems, but there are unlimited external problems. The only way to actually get peace on the inside is by giving up the idea of having problems
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In every moment, in everything that happens, you can look on the bright side of something. There are two ways of seeing almost everything
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The most important trick to be happy is to realize that happiness is a choice that you make and a skill that you develop. You choose to be happy, and then you work at it. It’s just like building muscles
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I like to stay free because then I can see the little miracles in life. There are little miracles everywhere; it’s just we have taken them for granted
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The problem happens when we have multiple desires. When we have fuzzy desires. When we want to do ten different things and we’re not clear about which is the one we care about
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You don’t want to be the guy who succeeds in life while being high-strung, high-stress, and unhappy while leaving a trail of emotional wreckage for you and your loved ones
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On meditation: Sit down, close your eyes, get in a comfortable position, and whatever happens, happens. If you think, you think. If you don’t think, you don’t think. Don’t put any effort into it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I need 4-5 hours of time by myself every day doing nothing. Because if I don’t have that time, I won’t be able to do anything
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You have to work on your internal state until you are free of as many biases and conditioned responses as possible. This will improve every aspect of your life
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Enlightenment is the space between your thoughts. It isn’t this thing you achieve after 30 years of sitting in a corner meditating. It’s something you can achieve moment to moment and you can be a certain percentage enlightened every single day
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: People who live far below their means enjoy a freedom that people busy upgrading their lifestyles can’t fathom
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Quick relaxation hack: "Drop face, soft belly". The face is usually wearing a mask to signal to others. The belly is often chronically tensed in a fight-or-flight response
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Children are happy because: 1) They’re not self conscious 2) They lack a sense of time pressure 3) They’ve no goals. The bottom line is they are living from moment to moment, and the mind is not there to interfere in their bliss
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think a lot of what we think of happiness is is just pleasure. It’s physical pleasure, either from, "Oh, that tasted good". Or it might be momentary pleasure from, "He loves me, she loves me"
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I actually think happiness is the absence of suffering. It comes from peace, and that comes from being very careful about that desire, judgment, reaction. Realizing that you don’t actually need something anymore. That something is not important to you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On how to deal with anxiety: I remember that I’m going to die — memento mori, as they say. It’s hard, though. Anxiety is the human condition. It’s probably the single most pervasive emotion. I don’t think people understand how deep anxiety runs. If I conquered anxiety, I’d be the Buddha; so would you if you conquered anxiety
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You should realize that this is such a short and precious life that it’s really important that you don’t spend it being unhappy. There’s no excuse for spending most of your life in misery. You’ve only got 70 years out of the 50 billion or so that the universe is going to be around
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The fact that you can listen to this podcast on an iPhone or whatever you’re listening to it on mans you’re already better off than a lot of people
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: To live in the present moment is the highest calling. It’s the source of all happiness
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It’s a bad habit that we develop that we forget how to appreciate what we do have
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I’m not a busy person and I’m not busy because I refuse to schedule things
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you try to micromanage yourself all you’re going to do is make yourself miserable
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Knowing how little you matter is very important for your own mental health and happiness
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Uncertainty, not outcome, is the root of stress
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think to have peace of mind, you have to have peace of body, first
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Looking forward to holidays takes the joy out of everyday
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You won’t get rich renting out your time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Escape competition through authenticity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Money will solve all your money problems but it doesn’t get you everywhere
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You just realize as you get older that it matters less and less and less
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Apply specific knowledge, with leverage, and eventually you will get what you deserve
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you can’t code, write books and blogs, record videos and podcasts
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Having a million-dollar net worth doesn’t make you a genius, and having less than a million-dollar net worth doesn’t make you a fool
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Arm yourself with specific knowledge, accountability, and leverage. Specific knowledge is knowledge that you cannot be trained for. If society can train you, it can train someone else, and replace you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Specific knowledge can be taught through apprenticeships or self-taught. It’s high paying because society has not yet figured out how to teach or automate it. It tends to be creative or technical
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You will get rich by giving society what it wants but does not yet know how to get. At scale
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: By the time people realize that they have enough money, they’ve lost their time and their health
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The ultimate purpose of money is so that you do not have to be in a specific place at a specific time doing anything you don’t want to do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In almost any salaried job, even at one that’s paying a lot per hour like a lawyer, or a doctor, you’re still putting in the hours, and every hour you get paid. So, what that means is when you’re sleeping, you’re not earning. When you’re retired, you’re not earning. When you’re on vacation, you’re not earning. And you can’t earn non-linearly
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: There are no get-rich-quick schemes. That’s just somebody else trying to get rich off of you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Set and enforce an aspirational hourly rate. If fixing a problem will save less than your rate, ignore it. If outsourcing a task will cost less than your rate, outsource it. Get comfortable disappointing people whose expectations will eat your life up, one hour at a time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You can spend your life however you want, but if you want to get rich, it has to be your number one overwhelming desire
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You retire by saving up enough money, becoming a monk, or by finding work that feels like play to you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I learned how to make money because it was a necessity. After it stopped being a necessity, I stopped caring about it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The first thing you realize when you make a bunch of money is that you’re still the same person
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Seek wealth, not money or status
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Wealth is assets that earn while you sleep
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Wealth creation is an evolutionarily recent positive-sum game. Status is an old zero-sum game. Those attacking wealth creation are often just seeking status
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Investing favors the dispassionate. Markets efficiently separate emotional investors from their money
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 1. The reason you want wealth is because it buys you your freedom. So, you don’t have to wear a tie like a collar around your neck
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 2. So, you don’t have to wake up at 7:00 AM, and rush to work, and sit in commute traffic
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 3. So, you don’t have to waste away your entire life grinding all your productive hours away into a soulless job that doesn’t fulfill you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The purpose of wealth is freedom. It’s nothing more than that. It’s not to buy fur coats, or drive Ferraris, or sail yachts, or jet around the world in your Gulfstream. That stuff gets really boring and really stupid, really fast
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The more worldly success you have, the more your ego gets built up. The more fearful you might be of losing it all. The more fearful my might be about what other people think. The more you have to lose. The more you get caught up in this dream of who you think you are. I think worldly success actually hurts
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Ignore people playing status games. They gain status by attacking people playing wealth creation games
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We can all be wealthy, all of us
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The best work is the work you’d do for free
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Work becomes flow at the limits of ability
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A taste of freedom can make you unemployable
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The secret to public speaking is to speak as if you were alone
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Organization is the enemy of innovation
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Solve via iteration. Then get paid via repetition
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Partner with rational optimists
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Self-awareness is the most attractive trait
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Give society what it doesn’t how how to get
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In well-functioning teams, each individual has high accountability for their part
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In an older society with few resources and mechanical work, the scheduled life is the most productive. In a modern society with permissionless leverage and creative work, the unscheduled life is the most productive
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You’re never going to be the best in the world at anything unless it’s something that you just absolutely love to do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Meetings should really be phone calls, phone call should be emails, and phone calls should just be texts
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Be present. Be meditative. Form real friendships. Stay away from business networking events or friendships where there is always an underlying business angle
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Surround yourself with the best people possible. If there’s someone greater out there to work with, go work with them
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Forty hour workweeks are a relic of the Industrial Age. Knowledge workers function like athletes — train and sprint, then rest and reassess
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Generally, most people will make the mistake of paying too much attention to the competition and being too much like the competition and not being authentic enough
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A small band of deeply committed believers will spread a story better than a horde of the lightly committed. True for religion, reputation, brand, currency, politics
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: At heart I’m an entrepreneur and any day in which I solve the same problem twice in a row, I’m pretty unhappy. So by definition, I like to do something different every day. I think all humans are sort of meant to do that kind of thing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Any meeting with eight people sitting around at a conference table, nothing is getting done in that meeting. You are literally just dying one hour at a time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: At the end of the day, we’re all founders. We’re all meant to work for ourselves. We’re not meant to go to nine to five jobs and be told what to do over and over
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Unnecessary meetings (and most are) are a mutually-assured-destruction of time. Learning how to avoid them is a prerequisite of doing anything great
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Networking is overrated. Become first and foremost a person of value and the network will be available whenever you need it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It’s only after you’re bored that you have the great ideas. It’s never going to be when you’re stressed, or busy, running around or rushed. Make the time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A lot of people think you can go to school and you can study for how to make money, but the reality is, there’s no skill called "business"
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The best founders I’ve found are the ones who are very long-term thinkers. Even decisions that maybe they shouldn’t care that much about early on, they fix it because they are not building a house, they’re putting bricks in the foundation of the skyscraper, at least in their minds
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: My number one predictor of whether or not a company will find product-market fit: High shipping cadence
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Keep an incredibly high bar for who you work with
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Behind every successful entrepreneur is a former failed self
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Leverage is critical. Leverage; Archimedes famously said, "Give me a lever long enough and a place to stand and I will move the earth"
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: There are three broad classes of leverage (labor, capital, and no marginal cost of replication)
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The modern age is an age of leverage. We’re leveraged through machines, we’re leveraged through media, we’re leveraged through money, we’re leveraged through people working with us
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A leveraged worker can out-produce a non-leveraged worker by a factor of 1000 or 10,000
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 1. We are now living in an age of nearly infinite leverage, and all the great fortunes are created through leverage
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 2. Your first job is to go and obtain leverage, and you can obtain leverage through permission by getting people to work for you, or by raising capital
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 3. Or you can get leverage permissionlessly by learning how to code or becoming good communicator and podcasting, broadcasting, creating videos, writing, etc
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: As a worker you want to be as leveraged as possible so that your work has a huge impact and it won’t take as much of your time or physical effort. Like you’d rather work with a bulldozer than work with your hands, the same way you’d rather work a computer than you would with a pencil
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In an age of infinite leverage, judgement is the most important skill
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: With a leveraged worker, the choice of how they make the decision is far more important, their judgment is far more important than how much time they put in or how hard they worked
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 1. A good software engineer, just by writing the right little piece of code and creating the right little application, can literally create half a billion dollars’ worth of value for a company
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 2. But 10 engineers working 10 times as hard, just because they choose the wrong model or the wrong product, or wrote it the wrong way or put in the wrong viral loop or what have you, they basically wasted their time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The maximum leverage would mean that you would have people working for you. It would mean you would have a funding, you would have capital. It would mean that you’d be writing a book, it would mean that you’d be writing code and that you’d be building a media presence
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Code and media are permissionless leverage. They’re the leverage behind the newly rich. You can create software and media that works for you while you sleep
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Embrace accountability, and take business risks under your own name. Society will reward you with responsibility, equity, and leverage
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Media travels and earns while you sleep. It searches the world for opportunities for you. Code is even better
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The robot army is already here – code lets you tell them what to do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On the Internet, a single individual can accomplish anything
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The modern world is a gift. It gives us tools and choices, but we need the self-discipline and wisdom to choose wisely
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Technology is not only the thing that moves the human race forward, but it’s the only thing that ever has. Without technology, we’re just monkeys playing in the dirt
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In the digital world, the upside is so large that there’s almost no such thing as risk
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Building technology means you don’t have to choose between practicing science, commerce, and art
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Notifications are just alarm clocks that someone else is setting for you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If they can train you to do it, then eventually they will train a computer to do it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 1. Things like Twitter and Facebook are not making you happy. They are making you unhappy
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 2. You are essentially playing a game that’s created by the creators of those systems, and yes, it can be a useful game once in a blue moon
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 3. You are engaging in envy, dispute, and resentment, comparison, jealousy, anger, about things that frankly just don’t matter
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The human brain is not designed to absorb all of the world’s breaking news and 24/7 emergencies, injected straight into the skull with clickbait headlines. If you pay attention to that stuff, even if you have a sound mind and body, it will eventually drive you insane
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think long-term, Bitcoin is a currency of the Internet. So, even if humans don’t use it, routers will use it. Web browsers will use it. Web servers will use it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Think of Bitcoin as a bank account in the cloud, and it’s completely decentralized: not the Swiss government, not the American government. It’s all the participants in the network enforcing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Bitcoin is an exit from the Fed. DeFi is an exit from Wall Street. Social media is an exit from mass media. Homeschooling is an exit from industrial education. Remote work is an exit from 9-5. Creator economy is an exit from employment. Individuals are leaving institutions
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think of Twitter as the place where I go to have a great conversation when I can’t have one locally, which seems to be all the time, and the more time that I spend on Twitter, the more I sort of curate this incredible group of very intelligent people that I just get to know purely through the quality of their thoughts
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Creativity is the last frontier. Automation over a long enough period of time will replace every non-creative job. That’s great news. That means that all of our basic needs are taken of, and what remains for us is to be creative, which is really what every human wants
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Perhaps this time is different, automation will permanently destroy jobs, and humanity is incapable of relearning and doing creative work. Perhaps it’s time to drop the tyranny of low expections, and new tools will liberate individuals from a lifetime of drudgery, as they always have
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think long-term and on a long enough time scale, maybe it’s 50 years from now or maybe it’s 500 years from now, almost everybody on this planet will work for themselves
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Technology is the application of knowledge to control the natural world. It’s the greatest driver of both human prosperity and our capacity for self-annihilation
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Social media has degenerated into a deafening cacophony of groups signaling and repeating their shared myths
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Ubiquitous streaming cameras with remote storage will eventually end almost all physical criminal activities
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The pace of technological change is accelerating so much that I think we do have the reach for all humans to live a life of abundance in our grasp
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Humans aren’t evolved to worry about everything happening outside of their immediate environment
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Specific knowledge can’t be taught, but can be learned
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Giving your kids everything prevents them from finding themselves
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you’re struggling through a subject, unless you need it for graduation, drop it. Go learn something that you want to learn
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Basically the library was my after school center
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Study microeconomics, game theory, psychology, persuasion, ethics, mathematics, and computers
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t [try to stay focused]. I follow my interest
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The only way to truly learn something is by doing it. Yes, listen to guidance. But don’t wait
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On learning anything (happiness, losing weight, etc.): You decide it’s important to you. You prioritize it above everything else. You read everything on the topic
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you learn how to learn, it’s the ultimate meta skill and I believe you can learn how to be healthy, you can learn how to be fit, you can learn how to be happy, you can learn how to have good relationships, you can learn how to be successful
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: When you’re memorizing something, it’s an indication that you don’t understand it. You should be able to re-derive anything on the spot and if you can’t, you don’t know it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Shorter feedback loops means more iterations, and it’s the number of iterations, not the number of hours, that drives learning
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is a skyscraper. You can take a shortcut with a fragile foundation of memorization, or build slowly upon a steel frame of understanding
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I use my tweets and other people’s tweets as maxims that help compress my own learnings and be able to recall them
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The overeducated are worse off than the undereducated, for they traded common sense for the illusion of knowledge
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think learning should be about learning the basics in all the fields and learning them really well over and over
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If the primary purpose of school was education, the Internet should obsolete it. But school is mainly about credentialing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On his best parenting advice: Love them unconditionally, try not to say "no", and always reward their innate curiosity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Identify your strengths and apply them to what you care about. Iterate at the edge of knowledge. Building it will feel like play to you, but look like work to others
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Keeping your intellectual curiosity alive is really important. The only way that’s going to happen is if you learn what you love, if you read what you love, if you do what you love
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant
Naval Ravikant
wisdom.quote: If I’m running a grade school curriculum for children, I would probably optimize happiness, nutrition, diet, exercise, "How do you build good habits?", "How do you break bad habits?", "How do you have good relationships?", "How do you find your spouse?", meditation, "How do you build basic skills, not memorize lots of facts?", "What kinds of books should you read?"
Your most important skill isn’t even what you majored in or even what you studied, it’s just knowing how to learn
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: What’s really important is to develop a love of learning. That is more important than anything else; it’s more important than what you learn. It’s more important than what school you go to, and it’s more important than what job you have
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think every child has the love of learning. Children are learning machines. They stop learning either because their ego gets too big and thinks that it knows everything or that it thinks it doesn’t needs to know more. Or because society somehow fails them
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Knowing something about everything allows you to navigate life. But knowing everything about something can show you what depth has to offer. It also gives you a joy and appreciation for what life has to offer
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: There’s a whole set of things we don’t even bother trying to teach. We don’t teach nutrition. We don’t teach cooking. We don’t teach how to be in happy, positive relationships. We don’t teach how to keep your body healthy and fit. We just say sports. We don’t teach happiness. We don’t teach meditation
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think the smartest people can explain things to a child. If you can’t explain it to a child, then you don’t know it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant
Naval Ravikant
wisdom.quote: The bigger problem this generation will face is adult education, not child education
Instead of memorizing, understand the basics so you can derive answers
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Read what you love until you love to read
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The Internet is the best school ever created. The best peers are on the Internet. The best books are on the Internet. The best teachers are on the Internet
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Study logic and math, because once you’ve mastered them, you won’t fear any book
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The genuine love for reading itself, when cultivated, is a superpower
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Free education is abundant, all over the Internet. It’s the desire to learn that’s scarce. Cultivate that desire by reading what you want
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: When I find something really interesting, I’ll reflect on it, research it, and then when I’m bored of it, I’ll drop it or I’ll flip to another book
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The best way to read is to: Pick up a lot of books. Start reading them all. Put down any book instantly that doesn’t grab you. And just keep going until you find something that speaks to you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The real education begins in the library, it begins with books. If you can learn to like to read, you never need to go to school
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: At any given time I’m reading somewhere between ten and 20 books. I’m flipping through them. If the book is getting a little boring, I’ll skip ahead
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Sometimes I’ll start reading a book in the middle because some paragraph caught my eye and I’ll just continue from there
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I feel no obligation whatsoever to finish the book. If at some point I decide the book is boring, or if it’s got pieces of it that are incorrect so now I can’t trust the rest of the information in there, I just delete it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Sometimes people wrap long books around simple ideas
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I no longer track books read or even care about books read. It’s about understanding concepts
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On if he has mentors: No, learn bits and pieces from everyone. I mostly learned from books
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t read anymore to complete books. I read to satisfy my genuine intellectual curiosity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The best founders I know listen to and read everyone, but then they ignore everyone and make up their own mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If they wrote it to make money, don’t read it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t have time is just saying it’s not a priority
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Time is the ultimate currency and I should have been more tight fisted with it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think most of life is about searching, it’s not about doing. People spend too much time doing and not enough time thinking about what they should be doing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Say no to more things to protect your time because it’s very precious. On your dying day, you will give everything you have for another day
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You literally have to free up your time because the world will assault you with its own agendas. You have to say no to everything and free up your time so you can solve the important problems
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Ruminating on the past is largely a waste of time. It’s illusory
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Schedules are so overrated. I wish I could have a completely unscheduled life; that would be something nice to shoot for
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: My only schedule is my daily morning workout, and even that I’m not perfect on it, but other than that I try to be as unscheduled as possible because I want to be free
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think it’s really worth – whenever you can in life, if you have the choice – optimizing for independence rather than optimizing for pay
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: What you want to do in life is, you want to be in control of your time, so you want to get into a leveraged job, and then you want to get into one where you control your own time and you’re tracked on the outputs
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant
Naval Ravikant
wisdom.quote: If they pay you what you’re worth, then you can get your time back, and if you get your time back, then you can be hyperefficient
I have no time for short-term things: dinners with people I won’t see again, tedious ceremonies to please tedious people, traveling to places that I wouldn’t go to on vacation
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Success is the enemy of learning. It can deprive you of the time and the incentive to start over. Beginner’s mind also needs beginner’s time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Be ruthless about not scheduling things. You will have to disappoint people, but when they want your time, that’s their problem, not yours
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We spend so much time in relationships. The average relationship probably lasts a couple years. We spend very little time deciding which relationship to get into. We spend so much time in a job, but we spend so little time deciding which job to get into. Choosing what city to live in can almost completely determine the trajectory of your life, but we spend so little time trying to figure out what city to live in
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I was very selfish with my time and I probably had the most productive year of my life
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t believe in work time. I just believe in time and you can spend it doing whatever you want to do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A clear mind, leads to better judgement, leads to better outcome
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You can have the mind or you can have the moment
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A busy mind can often rob you of peace of mind. The peace that we seek is not peace of mind, it’s peace from mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You want to rest your mind. You want to learn how to settle into your mind. Now, I look forward to solitary confinement. You leave me alone for a day, it will be the happiest day I’ve had in awhile. That is a superpower that I think everybody can attain
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: What I find is that 90 percent of thoughts that I have are fear. 90 percent are fear based. The other 10 percent are probably desire based
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You have to get out of that relative mindset because if you get into that relative mindset, you’re always going to hate people who do better than you, you’re always going to be jealous, you’re going to be envious of them
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: "Artists" calling for censorship don’t know what art is. "Scientists" citing consensus don’t know what science is. "Teachers" indoctrinating students don’t know what teaching is. "Journalists" parroting propaganda don’t know what reporting is. Programming us all day long
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The fewer desires I can have, the more I can accept the current state of things, the less my mind is moving because the mind really exists in motion towards the future or the past
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Everything is perfect exactly the way it is. It is only in our particular minds that we’re unhappy or not happy and things are perfect or imperfect because of what we desire
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The advantage of meditation is not that you’re suddenly going to gain the superpower to control your internal state, it’s that you will recognize just how out of control your mind is
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On the mind: It is like a monkey flinging feces, that’s running around the room, making trouble, shouting, breaking things. It’s completely uncontrollable. It’s an out-of-control mad person
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You have to see this mad creature in operation before you feel a certain distaste towards it and you start separating yourself from it. In that separation is liberation
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I think the number one thing that clouds us from being able to see reality is that we have preconceived notions of the way it should be
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A busy mind accelerates the perceived passage of time. Buy more time by cultivating peace of mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The clear thinking comes from having time to reflect and to pursue your genuine intellectual curiosity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you want to be effective in business, you need a clear, calm, cool, and collected mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Love is given, not received
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: True, unconditional love, is the province of parents and saints
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Love people more. […] It turns out you can give love. It’s free to give. […] On a long enough time scale, the universe sends it back your way
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Just be you and wait for the people who want that
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: When you have children, you learn to love something more than you love yourself, and you can talk about that all day long, but you have never had that feeling until you’ve had a child
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It’s not something you can buy. No amount of money or power will bring you true, unconditional love
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant
Naval Ravikant
wisdom.quote: If you don’t love yourself, who will?

We’re not really here that long, and we don’t really matter that much. Nothing that we do lasts. Eventually, you will fade. Your works will fade. Your children will fade. Your thoughts will fade. These planets will fade. This sun will fade. It will all be gone
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Doubt is the origin of wisdom
wisdom.author: Augustine of Hippo

wisdom.quote: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination
wisdom.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

wisdom.quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life
wisdom.author: Immanuel Kant

wisdom.quote: Foolishness is a twin sister of wisdom
wisdom.author: Witold Gombrowicz

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use. Thomas J
wisdom.author: Watson

wisdom.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: A wise man never loses anything, if he has himself
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom
wisdom.author: Francis Bacon

wisdom.quote: Discipline is wisdom and vice versa. M
wisdom.author: Scott Peck

wisdom.quote: Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: Wisdom sails with wind and time
wisdom.author: John Florio

wisdom.quote: A symptom of wisdom is curiosity. The evidence is calmness and perseverance. The causes are experimentation and understanding
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: A fool is known by his speech; and a wise man by silence
wisdom.author: Pythagoras

wisdom.quote: The most certain sign of wisdom is cheerfulness
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: The fool wonders, the wise man asks
wisdom.author: Benjamin Disraeli

wisdom.quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: There is only a finger’s difference between a wise man and a fool
wisdom.author: Diogenes

wisdom.quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens
wisdom.author: Jimi Hendrix

wisdom.quote: Never say no twice if you mean it
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is nothing but a preparation of the soul, a capacity, a secret art of thinking, feeling and breathing thoughts of unity at every moment of life
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse

wisdom.quote: We can know only that we know nothing. And that is the highest degree of human wisdom
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: Everything comes in time to him who knows how to wait
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end
wisdom.author: Leonard Nimoy

wisdom.quote: The best words are the ones you are ready for

wisdom.quote: A lot of wisdom is just realizing the long-term consequences of your actions. The longer term you’re willing to look, the wiser you’re going to seem to everybody around you

wisdom.quote: A weak reaction is to rush things. A strong reaction is to go slow and steady

wisdom.quote: We don’t receive wisdom; we must discover it for ourselves after a journey that no one can take for us or spare us

wisdom.quote: Wisdom ceases to be wisdom when it becomes too proud to weep, too grave to laugh, and too selfish to seek other than itself

wisdom.quote: Keep me away from the wisdom which does not cry, the philosophy which does not laugh and the greatness which does not bow before children
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: A man has made at least a start on discovering the meaning of human life when he plants shade trees under which he knows full well he will never sit
wisdom.author: David Elton Trueblood

wisdom.quote: The motto of chivalry is also the motto of wisdom; to serve all, but love only one
wisdom.author: Honoré de Balzac

wisdom.quote: He gossips habitually; he lacks the common wisdom to keep still that deadly enemy of man, his own tongue

wisdom.quote: Memory is not wisdom; idiots can by rote repeat volumes
wisdom.author: Yet what is wisdom without memory? Martin Farquhar Tupper

wisdom.quote: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment
wisdom.author: Will Rogers

wisdom.quote: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom
wisdom.author: Thomas Jefferson

wisdom.quote: Wisdom and deep intelligence require an honest appreciation of mystery
wisdom.author: Thomas Moore

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is knowing when you can’t be wise
wisdom.author: Paul Engle

wisdom.quote: Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences
wisdom.author: Norman Cousins

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two
wisdom.author: John Cheever

wisdom.quote: The two powers which in my opinion constitute a wise man are those of bearing and forbearing
wisdom.author: Epictetus

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is not finally tested in the schools. Wisdom cannot be passed from one having it to another not having it. Wisdom is of the soul, is not susceptible of proof, is its own proof

wisdom.quote: Wisdom and understanding can only become the possession of individual men by travelling the old road of observation, attention, perseverance, and industry

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is keeping a sense of fallibility of all our views and opinions

wisdom.quote: Much wisdom often goes with fewest words

wisdom.quote: He that composes himself is wiser than he that composes a book

wisdom.quote: Stronger by weakness, wiser men become

wisdom.quote: Be there a will, and wisdom finds a way

wisdom.quote: Reality – Dreams = Animal Being. Reality + Dreams = A Heart-Ache (usually called Idealism). Reality + Humor = Realism (also called Conservatism). Dreams – Humor = Fanaticism. Dreams + Humor = Fantasy. Reality + Dreams + Humor = Wisdom
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: Do now what your future you will thank you for
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Fast thinking looks cool but it’s deep thinking that makes all the difference. And deep thinking is always slow thinking

wisdom.quote: Who then is free? The wise man who can command himself
wisdom.author: Horace

wisdom.quote: He who would begun has half done. Dare to be wise; begin

wisdom.quote: Man is wise and constantly in quest of more wisdom; but the ultimate wisdom, which deals with beginnings, remains locked in a seed. There it lies, the simplest fact of the universe and at the same time the one which calls forth faith rather than reason

wisdom.quote: One part of wisdom is knowing what you don’t need anymore and letting it go

wisdom.quote: Do what you will, withdraw to the mountains, sit in a forest, you cannot live in isolation. You can live only in relationship, and as long as relationship is not understood, there can be no right action. Right action comes in understanding relationship, which reveals the process of oneself. Self-knowledge is the beginning of wisdom, it is a field of affection, warmth, and love, therefore a field rich with flowers

wisdom.quote: First of all, to understand truth you must stand alone, entirely and wholly alone. No Master, no teacher, no guru, no system, no self-discipline will ever lift for you the veil which conceals wisdom. Wisdom is the understanding of enduring values and the living of those values. No one can lead you to wisdom

wisdom.quote: Our concern in meditation is to know oneself, not only superficially, but the whole content of the inner, hidden consciousness. Without knowing all that and being free of its conditioning, you cannot possibly go beyond the mind’s limits. That is why the thought process must cease, and for this cessation there must be knowledge of oneself. Therefore meditation is the beginning of wisdom, which is the understanding of one’s own mind and heart
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Men who know themselves are no longer fools. They stand on the threshold of the door of wisdom

wisdom.quote: Wisdom consists not so much in knowing what to do in the ultimate as knowing what to do next

wisdom.quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum

wisdom.quote: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself a fool

wisdom.quote: We’re all going to change. Otherwise, it’s boring.

wisdom.quote: Pain and foolishness lead to great bliss and complete knowledge, for Eternal Wisdom created nothing under the sun in vain

wisdom.quote: True wisdom is remembering that in the end, no matter what, everything will be fine

wisdom.quote: Follow your instincts. That’s where true wisdom manifests itself

wisdom.quote: Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech

wisdom.quote: There is a universal, intelligent, life force that exists within everyone and everything. It resides within each one of use as a deep wisdom, an inner knowing. We can access this wonderful source of knowledge and wisdom through our intuition, an inner sense that tells us what feels right and true for us at any given moment

wisdom.quote: Seek your own reality, that is what a wise man should do
wisdom.author: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

wisdom.quote: If the fool would persist in his folly he would become wise
wisdom.author: William Blake

wisdom.quote: Knowledge shrinks as wisdom grows

wisdom.quote: Memory is the mother of all wisdom

wisdom.quote: The source of wisdom is pain

wisdom.quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers

wisdom.quote: One principle eliminates a thousand decisions

wisdom.quote: Don’t try to become, let go of who you’re not

wisdom.quote: Wisdom begins at the end

wisdom.quote: Wisdom comes by disillusionment

wisdom.quote: Wisdom never lies

wisdom.quote: Wisdom has never made a bigot, but learning has

wisdom.quote: Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another

wisdom.quote: The wisest of the wise may err

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is marvelous, but wisdom is even better

wisdom.quote: Pain is the doorway to wisdom and to truth
wisdom.author: Keith Miller

wisdom.quote: I prefer the folly of enthusiasm to the indifference of wisdom

wisdom.quote: No man was ever wise by chance

wisdom.quote: It is wiser to find out than to suppose

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is knowledge which has become a part of one’s being

wisdom.quote: Kindness is wisdom

wisdom.quote: Not by age but by capacity is wisdom acquired

wisdom.quote: Wisdom outweighs any wealth

wisdom.quote: Innocence dwells with wisdom, but never with ignorance. William Blake (wikiquote

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two

wisdom.quote: Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth

wisdom.quote: If you can’t explain it to a six year old, you don’t understand it yourself

wisdom.quote: The whole is more than the sum of its parts

wisdom.quote: The aim of the wise is not to secure pleasure, but to avoid pain

wisdom.quote: To the wise, life is a problem; to the fool, a solution

wisdom.quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength

wisdom.quote: Death smiles at us all, but all a man can do is smile back

wisdom.quote: I cannot teach you, only help you to explore yourself, nothing more

wisdom.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without

wisdom.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become

wisdom.quote: Irrigators channel waters; fletchers straighten arrows; carpenters bend wood; the wise master themselves

wisdom.quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom

wisdom.quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men

wisdom.quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves

wisdom.quote: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things

wisdom.quote: Cultivate the habit of early rising. It is unwise to keep the head long on a level with the feet

wisdom.quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something

wisdom.quote: Knowledge without justice ought to be called cunning rather than wisdom

wisdom.quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: The wisest have the most authority
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: Wisdom has its root in goodness, not goodness its root in wisdom

wisdom.quote: Before we acquire great power we must acquire wisdom to use it well

wisdom.quote: The invariable mark of wisdom is to see the miraculous in the common
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power
wisdom.author: Rene Descartes

wisdom.quote: I think; therefore I am
wisdom.author: Rene Descartes

wisdom.quote: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it

wisdom.quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel

wisdom.quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us

wisdom.quote: I am the wisest man alive, for I know one thing, and that is that I know nothing
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: He who is not just is severe, he who is not wise is sad

wisdom.quote: Superstition is to religion what astrology is to astronomy: the mad daughter of a wise mother
wisdom.author: Voltaire

wisdom.quote: Is there anyone so wise as to learn by the experience of others?
wisdom.author: Voltaire

wisdom.quote: Before you speak, listen. Before you write, think. Before you spend, earn. Before you invest, investigate. Before you criticize, wait. Before you pray, forgive. Before you quit, try. Before you retire, save. Before you die, give. William A
wisdom.author: Ward

wisdom.quote: The mind reflects the world, and the world reflects the mind
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: The greatest minds are humble and simple
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Our life is shaped by our mind; we become what we think. Joy follows a pure thought like a shadow that never leaves
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The greatest freedom is to be free of our own mind

wisdom.quote: We say that we want peace of mind but what we really want is peace from mind

wisdom.quote: The modern mind is overstimulated and the modern body is understimulated and overfed. Meditation, exercise, and fasting restore an ancient balance
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Few men come to realize that their entire life has been lived inside their mind
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: If you want power, control the narrative in other people’s head. If you seek happiness, control the narrative in your own head
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: The empires of the future will be empires of the mind
wisdom.author: Winston Churchill (1943)

wisdom.quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: Every time your mind shifts, your world shifts

wisdom.quote: Calmness, gentleness, silence, self-restraint and purity: these are the disciplines of the mind

wisdom.quote: A mind that is full of conclusions is a dead mind. A living mind is a free mind, learning, never concluding

wisdom.quote: The end of the war with the mind is the end of war

wisdom.quote: To a mind that is still the whole universe surrenders
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: The closer one comes to truth, the further one gets from mind
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Is it the world that’s busy, or my mind?
wisdom.author: Haemin Sunim

wisdom.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty… otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Not a mother, nor a father, nor any other relative can do more for the well-being of one than a rightly-directed mind can
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Think of the old cliché about the mind being ‘an excellent servant but a terrible master’. This, like many clichés, so lame and banal on the surface, actually expresses a great and terrible truth. David Foster Wallace (This Is Water, fs
wisdom.author: blog)

wisdom.quote: 60% of the human body may be made of water, but over 80% of the human mind is made of stories
wisdom.author: François Chollet

wisdom.quote: No technique of the mind will free you from the mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The mind is a flywheel, spun by fear
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Our mind is evolved to be paranoid, fearful and angry
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The need for certainty is the greatest disease the mind faces
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: A man who has not clarity of mind has nothing
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: The mind that asks a lot of questions is self-correcting
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: Paradise is within you, in your state of no-mind. And hell is also within you, in your very mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Distractions really work by exploiting the weaknesses of our mind
wisdom.author: Yuval Noah Harari

wisdom.quote: What the mind doesn’t understand, it worships or fears
wisdom.author: Alice Walker

wisdom.quote: Your mind is an abandoned playground. Left behind in early adulthood, now filled with clutter and trash. Meditation is how you remove them. Then you can play once again

wisdom.quote: In an age of mental gluttony, meditation is fasting for the mind. Before paying a therapist to listen to you, listen to yourself. Before clearing your inbox, clear your mind

wisdom.quote: Your mind is an ever-producing thought machine. The world is an ever-producing noise machine. The older I get, the more I realize that success just means peace from both

wisdom.quote: It is the mind of man alone that is the cause of his bondage or freedom

wisdom.quote: The richest people have health, time and peace of mind
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Too many tricks have been played upon the mind for it to be quiet
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: How can a mind that is burdened with beliefs see clearly? How can it be free to observe?
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: A mind that has no fear is capable of great love
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: All the resources we need are in the mind
wisdom.author: Theodore Roosevelt

wisdom.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life

wisdom.quote: Most people are about as happy as they make up their minds to be
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: Where the mind goes the body will follow
wisdom.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

wisdom.quote: Emancipate yourself from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our minds
wisdom.author: Bob Marley

wisdom.quote: Hating clouds the mind. It gets in the way of strategy. Leaders cannot afford to hate
wisdom.author: Nelson Mandela

wisdom.quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: The mind is a whore
wisdom.author: Susan Sontag

wisdom.quote: Maturity of mind is best shown in slow belief
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: In the small matters trust the mind, in the large ones the heart
wisdom.author: Sigmund Freud

wisdom.quote: Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The conscious mind is a bad judge of its own situation and often persists in the illusion that its attitude is just the right one
wisdom.author: Carl Jung

wisdom.quote: I believe that the mind can be permanently profaned by the habit of attending to trivial things, so that all our thoughts shall be tinged with triviality
wisdom.author: Henry David Thoreau (Life Without Principle)

wisdom.quote: As a result of material development and modern education, people commonly seek happiness in external things, but neglect their minds. True, lasting happiness depends on our taming our unruly minds. This is not so much about intellectual development as cultivating a warm heart
wisdom.author: 14th Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: The mind is definitely something that can be transformed, and meditation is a means to transform it
wisdom.author: 14th Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: One always feels better when one has made up one’s mind. C.S
wisdom.author: Lewis (The Last Battle)

wisdom.quote: Rather a mind well-shaped than well-full
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: The most fruitful and natural exercise for our minds is, in my opinion, conversation
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues
wisdom.author: René Descartes (Discourse on the Method)

wisdom.quote: If you take care of your mind, you take care of the world
wisdom.author: Arianna Huffington

wisdom.quote: Man can alter his life by altering his thinking
wisdom.author: William James

wisdom.quote: You are not your mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: Be the observer of your mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: Move the body. Rest the mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A clear mind is a happy heart
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: Your entitled mind is dead weight
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: All problems are illusions of the mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: A hasty walk is a sign of a restless mind
wisdom.author: Sven Schnieders

wisdom.quote: Creativity arises behind the conscious mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Beliefs and thoughts alter cells in your body
wisdom.author: Bruce Lipton

wisdom.quote: The world is nothing but your own magnified mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Fear doesn’t exist anywhere except in the mind
wisdom.author: Dale Carnegie

wisdom.quote: You can have the mind or you can have the moment
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Answers fill your mind. Questions expand your mind
wisdom.author: Kunal

wisdom.quote: The greatest danger we face is the mind going soft
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: We have more idleness in the mind than in the body
wisdom.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.quote: You have a mind, but you are not the boss of your mind
wisdom.author: Giovanni Dienstmann

wisdom.quote: The wiser you get, the less you take your mind seriously
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: When the mind is speaking without permission, it’s lying
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Mind always goes ahead or lags behind. Remain with the moment
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: It is our mind, and that alone, that chains us or sets us free
wisdom.author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

wisdom.quote: The mind itself is a muscle — it can be trained and conditioned
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Your heart is the light of this world. Don’t cover it with your mind
wisdom.author: Mooji

wisdom.quote: The heart surrenders everything to the moment. The mind judges and holds back
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: Earn with your mind, not with your time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas – not money
wisdom.author: Robert Collier

wisdom.quote: Perfect tranquility within consists in the good ordering of the mind, the realm of your own
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: You can’t always control what goes on outside, but you can always control what goes on inside
wisdom.author: Wayne Dyer

wisdom.quote: The only way to conquer the mind is to stop fighting it
wisdom.author: Sven Schnieders

wisdom.quote: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success
wisdom.author: Joyce Brothers

wisdom.quote: And I realize that no matter where I am, whether in a little room full of thought, or in this endless universe of stars and mountains, it’s all in my mind
wisdom.author: Jack Kerouac (Lonesome Traveler)

wisdom.quote: We all have forests on our minds. Forests unexplored, unending. Each one of us gets lost in the forest, every night, alone. Ursula K
wisdom.author: Le Guin (The Wind’s Twelve Quarters)

wisdom.quote: Sometimes our body is willing, but our mind is weak. Sometimes our mind is willing, but our body is weak. Do not be afraid. Strive to extend your capacity but do not be disappointed with yourself. What does not challenge us, cannot change us. B.K.S
wisdom.author: Iyengar

wisdom.quote: When your mind is telling you to quit and give up, remember all the repetitions and sacrifices made along the way
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: Get off your phones, computers, and shut the TV off. Don’t let this fast-paced world dull your sharpest weapon, that weapon being your mind
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: When your mind is telling you that you’re done, that you’re exhausted, that you cannot possibly go any further, you’re only actually 40% done
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: In the past, this mind has wandered as it liked, wherever it liked, at its own pleasure. Now I will control my mind wisely, as a mahout with his goad controls an elephant in must
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Your mind created the entire world
wisdom.author: Byron Katie

wisdom.quote: Elevate yourself through the power of your mind, and not degrade yourself, for the mind can be the friend and also the enemy of the self
wisdom.author: Bhagavad Gita

wisdom.quote: The conventional mind is passive – it consumes information and regurgitates it in familiar forms. The dimensional mind is active, transforming everything it digests into something new and original, creating instead of consuming
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: If you thought that you were insignificant and had no power in this world, think again. Your mind is actually shaping the world around you
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: Your mind has the power to change all of the outer aspects of your life. You create your life from the inside out
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: See it in your mind until it excites and thrills you, and you will most surely hold it in your hands
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: When we truly recognize that our beliefs are that powerful – we hold the key to freedom
wisdom.author: Bruce Lipton

wisdom.quote: When you transform your mind, everything you experience is transformed
wisdom.author: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

wisdom.quote: A mind is like a parachute. It doesn’t work if it is not open
wisdom.author: Frank Zappa

wisdom.quote: Do not be so open-minded that your brains fall out. G.K
wisdom.author: Chesterton

wisdom.quote: Sometimes I think my mind is a monkey constantly throwing feces at itself
wisdom.author: Kamal Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Singing connects the mind with the heart and the heart with the soul. So sing
wisdom.author: I dare you! Neale Donald Walsch

wisdom.quote: Some times saying "f*ck it" at the right time can be a very powerful thing. It tells your mind that you are willing to do whatever it takes to get to the other side
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: You have a mind? Yes
wisdom.author: Well, why not use it? Isn’t that all you want – for it to do its job? Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: If you never change your mind, why have one
wisdom.author: Edward de Bono

wisdom.quote: The moment is always complete. Only the mind is lacking
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Speech is the index of the mind
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: Fear is what prevents the flowering of the mind
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: A mind that is controlled, disciplined in the sense of conforming to a pattern, such a mind is not free, it is a distorted mind
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: An infected mind is a far more dangerous pestilence than any plague — one only threatens your life, the other destroys your character
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: You’ll never change someone’s mind by telling them that they aren’t allowed to think that way
wisdom.author: Michael (@mmay3r)

wisdom.quote: A thief may harm a thief; an enemy may harm an enemy; but a wrongly directed mind can do oneself far greater harm
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Mediocre minds usually dismiss anything which reaches beyond their own understanding
wisdom.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.quote: The moment that judgment stops through acceptance of what is, you are free of the mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle (The Power of Now, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: The mind is a superb instrument if used rightly. Used wrongly, however, it becomes very destructive
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: The great viruses of our time spread through minds, not through bodies
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Pride blunts the very instrument we need to own in order to succeed: our mind. Our ability to learn, to adapt, to be flexible, to build relationships, all of this is dulled by pride
wisdom.author: Ryan Holiday

wisdom.quote: Mediocre minds are outraged by small insults but passive, subdued, and silent in front of very large ones
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (Bed of Procrustes, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: The crowd mind is the lowest mind in existence. It is the minimum sensibility, minimum consciousness, minimum love, minimum life
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Mind is the illusion that which is not but appears, and appears so much that you think that you are the mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: More drugs are taken to quiet the mind than to heal the body
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The mind is its own beautiful prisoner. E
wisdom.author: E Cummings (Tulips and Chimneys)

wisdom.quote: You can’t escape your mind but you can program it and beautify it
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Knowing your own mind is the solution to all our problems
wisdom.author: Lama Yeshe

wisdom.quote: Reality never comes as a problem. It is only the ideas about reality that comes as a problem
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Past and future are two aspects of the same coin. The name of the coin is mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: The mind’s direction is more important than its progress
wisdom.author: Joseph Joubert

wisdom.quote: The mind in itself has no needs, except for those it creates itself. Is undisturbed, except for its own disturbances. Knows no obstructions, except those from within
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: The mind commands the body and is instantly obeyed. The mind commands itself and meets resistance
wisdom.author: Augustine of Hippo

wisdom.quote: Not to do evil, to cultivate merit, to purify one’s mind – this is the Teaching of the Buddhas
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Ignoring the mind is a beautiful sadhana. This is what many of the sages did. They ignored the mind out of existence. It loses its influence and its potency when it is ignored
wisdom.author: Mooji

wisdom.quote: Your mind is a prison, awareness is the key, and the door isn’t even locked
wisdom.author: @zen_fi

wisdom.quote: You don’t become awakened by adding more content to your mind. In fact, those that have awakened say that they actually know less. What comes with awakening is the ability to embrace "not knowing
wisdom.author: " Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: The average mind is focused on the future and paralyzed by fear. The wise mind is focused on the present and moved by love
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Don’t fight against your mind. Instead, try to understand it. Try to see why it’s behaving the way it is. Watching motivational videos will only lead you to fight against your mind. Journaling, calm contemplation, and meditation will help you understand your mind
wisdom.author: Kunal (@CrazyPolymath)

wisdom.quote: Without understanding myself the mind can deceive itself, it can have illusions according to its particular conditioning. When you know your conditioning and are free of it, there is no possibility of any kind of illusion
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Mind is mind. The contents might be different but the essence is the same. Understand your own mind and you will better understand the mind of others. Andy Puddicombe (headspace
wisdom.author: com)

wisdom.quote: To go out of your mind once a day is tremendously important, because by going out of your mind you come to your senses
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: The mind requires some relaxation, and cannot always support its bent to care and industry
wisdom.author: David Hume

wisdom.quote: The immature mind compares itself with what is and what should be
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Fasting focuses the mind – it replaces all desires with a single desire
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A mind that is fast is sick. A mind that is slow is sound. A mind that is still is divine
wisdom.author: Meher Baba

wisdom.quote: You become what you think about
wisdom.author: Napoleon Hill

wisdom.quote: You become that to which you are most exposed
wisdom.author: Denis Waitley

wisdom.quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become a reality
wisdom.author: Earl Nightingale

wisdom.quote: If you do not run your subconscious mind yourself, someone else will run it for you
wisdom.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

wisdom.quote: You cannot entirely control your subconscious mind, but you can voluntarily hand over to it any plan, desire, or purpose which you wish transformed into concrete form
wisdom.author: Napoleon Hill

wisdom.quote: Your subconscious mind loves pictures, so when you place a picture in your subconscious mind, it must do everything to make it materialize
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: Whatever goal you give to your subconscious mind, it will work night and day to achieve
wisdom.author: Jack Canfield

wisdom.quote: The funny thing about the mind is that if you ask a question and then listen quietly, the answer usually appears
wisdom.author: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

wisdom.quote: The mind does most of its best thinking when we aren’t there. The answers are there in the morning
wisdom.author: Alain de Botton

wisdom.quote: Our minds are susceptible to the influence of external voices, telling us what we require to be satisfied, voices that may drown our the faint sounds emitted from our souls, and distract us from the careful, arduous task of accurately naming our priorities
wisdom.author: Alain de Botton (Status Anxiety)

wisdom.quote: Your mind automatically generates thoughts related to the information you consume. Be conscious of your information diet
wisdom.author: Michael (@mmay3r)

wisdom.quote: Unresolved thoughts, prematurely pushed out of the mind, pile up in an internal landfill – which eventually pokes out of the subconscious and manifests as chronic, nonspecific anxiety
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Our subconscious minds have no sense of humor, play no jokes and cannot tell the difference between reality and an imagined thought or image. What we continually think about eventually will manifest in our lives
wisdom.author: Robert Collier
