wisdom.quote: The secret of happiness is love and secret of love is nonjudgmental care.
wisdom.author: Debasish Mridha

wisdom.quote: Share your love, share you happiness, care for others; your wealth will be endless.
wisdom.author: Debasish Mridha

wisdom.quote: For a game, you don’t need a teacher.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: I thought about the difference between a mama's girl and a daddy's girl. I decided that a daughter who belongs to her daddy expects gifts, while a daughter who belongs to her mama expects a lot more. Not from her mama. From herself.
wisdom.author: Victoria Bond

wisdom.quote: We are no longer in the dispensation of age and experience. We are in the era of knowledge and information. Information leads a true leader and a true leader leads others.
wisdom.author: Israelmore Ayivor

wisdom.quote: It is not really hard to do nothing. Many can. The hard part is doing nothing without feeling guilty about it.
wisdom.author: Haim Shapira

wisdom.quote: See with the eyes of love and a thing becomes beautiful. See with the eyes of hate and things are ugly.
wisdom.author: Joy Cowley

wisdom.quote: Wisdom doesn't automatically come with old age.Nothing does --- except wrinkles.It's true,some wines improves with age.But only if the grapes were good in the first place
wisdom.author: Abigail Van Buren

wisdom.quote: But perhaps there are in us forces other than mind and heart, other even than the senses - mysterious forces which take hold of us in the moments when the others are asleep; and perhaps it was such forces that Melchior had found in the depths of those pale eyes which had looked at him so timidly one evening when he had accosted the girl on the bank of the river, and had sat down beside her in the reeds - without knowing why - and had given her his hand.
wisdom.author: Romain Rolland

wisdom.quote: While wisdom dictates the need for education, education does not necessarily make one wise.
wisdom.author: Ben Carson

wisdom.quote: Those who do not think bout the future cannot have one.
wisdom.author: Michael J. Kami

wisdom.quote: Snobbery might sometimes look cool, like smoking, but the end result is usually a repelling one.
wisdom.author: Trent Zelazny

wisdom.quote: Many scientists have tried to make determinism and complementarity the basis of conclusions that seem to me weak and dangerous; for instance, they have used Heisenberg's uncertainty principle to bolster up human free will, though his principle, which applies exclusively to the behavior of electrons and is the direct result of microphysical measurement techniques, has nothing to do with human freedom of choice. It is far safer and wiser that the physicist remain on the solid ground of theoretical physics itself and eschew the shifting sands of philosophic extrapolations.
wisdom.author: Louis de Broglie

wisdom.quote: Never say no to now
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: Some people would rather be right than free.
wisdom.author: Vivian Amis

wisdom.quote: Who strive not for objects unattainable, grieve not for what lost and gone be, Who suffer not mind clouded amid mishap, have intellect with wisdom truly.[26]- 33 Mahatma Vidur
wisdom.author: Munindra Misra

wisdom.quote: It is not enough to show how clever we are by showing how obscure everything is".
wisdom.author: J.L. Austin

wisdom.quote: Don’t try to visualize the great mass audience. There is no such audience—every reader is a different person.
wisdom.author: William Zinsser

wisdom.quote: Wisdom, itself, is often an abstraction associated not with fact or reality but with the man who asserts it and the manner of its assertion.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: It would be a mistake, though, to consider care by family doctors or midwives inferior to that offered by obstetricians simply on the grounds that obstetricians need not refer care to a family physician or midwife if no complications develop during a course of labor.
wisdom.author: Ina May Gaskin

wisdom.quote: In seeking wisdom thou art wise; in imagining that thou hast attained it - thou art a fool.
wisdom.author: Lord Chesterfield

wisdom.quote: Wenn man noch nicht den Menschen dienen kann, wie sollte man den Geistern dienen können?
wisdom.author: Konfuzius

wisdom.quote: You despise books; you whose lives are absorbed in the vanities of ambition, the pursuit of pleasure or indolence; but remember that all the known world, excepting only savage nations, is governed by books.
wisdom.author: Voltaire

wisdom.quote: Even the best inborn potentialities for achievement do not render unnecessary patient and persistent practice.
wisdom.author: Ralph Alfred Habas

wisdom.quote: The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.
wisdom.author: Voltaire

wisdom.quote: Wenn man noch nicht das Leben kennt, wie sollte man den Tod kennen.
wisdom.author: Konfuzius

wisdom.quote: That vice has often proved an emancipator of the mind, is one of the most humiliating, but, at the same time, one of the most unquestionable facts in history.
wisdom.author: W.E.H. Lecky

wisdom.quote: It is like this: Some people care deeply but they don't know how to say it; then some people say words to make it seem like they care deeply, but in reality they don't. Some people care deeply only in the moment, like seeds which last in the soil for three days until dying out; and others can't see the moments, but their roots do run deep. Some people can imitate what it looks like to care deeply and they can fabricate that for a while though they never did feel anything on the inside of them; while others are incapable of showing outwardly how they feel on the inside, it is a monster they struggle with, their feelings so strong they cannot even let those beasts out of their cages, they fear their own creatures! Some people care deeply here, and over there, and all over the place, you never really know where they belong because they seem to belong to everyone and to everything; while others don't care about anybody but you can see where they belong, who they belong to, there is always this one person or those two people and small places. Some people belong to themselves only and if you want to be a part of their lives, you'll have to become a part of them and after you do, they will never leave you because you are inside of their bones now; while others don't even know who they are or where they're going and if you belong to someone like that, you could be here today and gone tomorrow! Some people don't care and don't act like they care and we don't believe them until they make us believe them; while others care and they act like they care and we don't believe them until it's too late. We are often wounded and torn, because we never know which kind of a person they are until we are either wounded and torn, or until we have found a home. It's either or, always either or, and neither of these outcomes are easy ones because either one will change your life.
wisdom.author: C. JoyBell C.

wisdom.quote: Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.
wisdom.author: Mike Tyson

wisdom.quote: There are occasions and causes, why and wherefore in all things.
wisdom.author: W. Shakespeare

wisdom.quote: Si quelques heures font une grande différence dans le cœur de l’homme, faut-il s’en étonner ? Il n’y a qu’une minute de la vie à la mort.
wisdom.author: Chateaubriand

wisdom.quote: We are often jealous of our little secrets, though to another ear they generally convey neither profit nor entertainment.
wisdom.author: Eden Phillpotts

wisdom.quote: We will never be more that we have been destined to be!
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Prefiero, señor, obrar bien y fracasar, antes que triunfar con malas artes.Palabras de Neoptólemo a Odiseo, en la tragedia griega Filoctetes.
wisdom.author: Sófocles

wisdom.quote: No one can surely know what knowledge is without the presence of truth.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: The absolute truth is one for an infinity of possible relative truths which lie.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: The ending can only start with the beginning and end with self estrangement, as to become once again his own/old self. This is why every man is a continuous ending.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: On se réconcilie avec un ennemi qui nous est inférieur pour les qualités du coeur ou de l'esprit ; on ne pardonne jamais à celui qui nous surpasse par l'âme et le génie.
wisdom.author: Chateaubriand

wisdom.quote: Knowledge can be communicated, but not wisdom. One can find it, live it, be fortified by it, do wonders through it, but one cannot communicate and teach it.
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse

wisdom.quote: Getting older is not an intellectually demanding process.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: ... dançava para si mesmo, um homem nu entre cegos...
wisdom.author: Christopher Rice

wisdom.quote: To the wise, peace of mind is the result of being fine with how things are; to the foolish, the result of things being fine.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: The confidence essential to effective habit-making comes as a rule from knowledge of previous and related successes.
wisdom.author: Ralph Alfred Habas

wisdom.quote: The vaunted experience of age was perhaps only a matter of wounds and scarring -- that young minds to old minds might be as young bodies to old bodies: stronger, more vital, less twisted by damage.
wisdom.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

wisdom.quote: A well-written article does not make what was written factual or something to subscribe to. Fiction does not become fact because it looks good.Fiction does not become fact because you wish it were true. Fiction does not become fact because it has turned into popular opinion.Remember this before reading the news, views, opinions or commentary.
wisdom.author: Loren Weisman

wisdom.quote: Hasta la vista, baby.
wisdom.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

wisdom.quote: If you want something, work for it. Prayer is super-fantstic, faith is 'mwah'! But work is necessary and important. So work for what you want.
wisdom.author: Wisdom Kwashie Mensah

wisdom.quote: I hate wise men because they are lazy, cowardly, and prudent. To the philosophers' equanimity, which makes them indifferent to both pleasure and pain, I prefer devouring passions. The sage knows neither the tragedy of passion, nor the fear of death, nor risk and enthusiasm, nor barbaric, grotesque, or sublime heroism. He talks in proverbs and gives advice. He does not live, feel, desire, wait for anything. He levels down all the incongruities of life and then suffers the consequences. So much more complex is the man who suffers from limitless anxiety. The wise man's life is empty and sterile, for it is free from contradiction and despair. An existence full of irreconcilable contradictions is so much richer and creative. The wise man's resignation springs from inner void, not inner fire. I would rather die of fire than of void.
wisdom.author: Emil Cioran

wisdom.quote: men are undoubtedly more in danger from prosperity than from adversity. for when matters go smoothly, they flatter themselves, and are intoxicated by their success
wisdom.author: John Calvin

wisdom.quote: One hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the most skillful, subduing the other's military without battle is the most skillful.
wisdom.author: Sun Tzu

wisdom.quote: ... anyone can acquire wealth, the real art is giving it away.
wisdom.author: Daisy Goodwin

wisdom.quote: Buddhism is all about science. If science is the systematic pursuit of the accurate knowledge of reality, then science is Buddhism, Buddhism is science.
wisdom.author: Robert A.F. Thurman

wisdom.quote: Yes - en I's rich now, come to look at it. I owns myself, en I's wuth eight hund'd dollars. I wisht I had de money, I wouldn' want no mo'.
wisdom.author: Mark Twain

wisdom.quote: Vessels large may venture more, But little boats should keep near shore.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: I want a man who knows something about himself. And is appalled. And has to forgive himself to get along.
wisdom.author: Charles Percy Snow

wisdom.quote: Only those who row the boat make waves
wisdom.author: Christina Dodd

wisdom.quote: To tell others thatIt is a rumor Will not do. When your own heart asks How will you respond?
wisdom.author: Gosen Wakashū

wisdom.quote: The best lessons learned are from other peoples mistakes.
wisdom.author: Melissa L. Bradley

wisdom.quote: The ultimate difference between God's wisdom and man's wisdom is how they relate to the glory of God's grace in Christ crucified. God's wisdom makes the glory of God's grace our supreme treasure. But man's wisdom delights in seeing himself as resourceful, self-sufficient, self determining, and not utterly dependent on God's free grace.
wisdom.author: John Piper

wisdom.quote: It is a fool of a shepherd who culls his dogs.
wisdom.author: Jefferson Smith

wisdom.quote: I would rather risk failure than achieve it without risk.
wisdom.author: Millard Johnson

wisdom.quote: L'homme qui n'a pas été anarchiste à seize ans est un imbécile. Mais c'en est un autre, s'il l'est encore à quarante.
wisdom.author: Georges Clemenceau

wisdom.quote: That’s going to be your trouble — judgment about yourself.(Tender is the Night)
wisdom.author: Scott Fitzgerald

wisdom.quote: He brooded on how close destruction always was to all creatures, animals as well as humans, and he realized that there is nothing we can predict or know for certain in this world except death.
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse

wisdom.quote: To advance spiritually requires a method of practice & determination to carry it out.
wisdom.author: Allan Lokos

wisdom.quote: The dead to the grave, the living to the loaf.
wisdom.author: Miguel de Cervantes

wisdom.quote: The delight we take in our senses is an implicit desire to know the ultimate reason for things, the highest cause. The desire for wisdom that philosophy etymologically is is a desire for the highest or divine causes. Philosophy culminates in theology. All other knowledge contains the seeds of contemplation of the divine.
wisdom.author: Josef Pieper

wisdom.quote: The scepticism which men affect towards their higher inspirations is often not an honest doubt, but a guilty negligence, and is a sign of narrow mind and defective wisdom.
wisdom.author: James Martineau

wisdom.quote: Let us be sure that the lady of our choice possesses certain tangible qualities that we admire; and if in other ways she falls short of our ideal, we must be patient and call to mind those qualities that first induced us to begin our courting.
wisdom.author: Lady Murasaki Shikibu

wisdom.quote: Silence will speakIf given an ear;Stillness is the movementOf our atmosphere;Circles have sidesWhen we draw the line;Death is sleepIn limited time.
wisdom.author: Alaina Odessa

wisdom.quote: Life is easy. We make it hard.
wisdom.author: Danny Wilson

wisdom.quote: the only graceful way to accept an insult is to ignore it; if you cant ignore it, top it; if you cant top it, laugh at it; if you cant laugh at it, its probably deserved
wisdom.author: Russell Lynes

wisdom.quote: Don’t become bigoted about bigots.
wisdom.author: Scott Ross

wisdom.quote: It takes 43 muscles to frown and 3 to raise the middle finger.
wisdom.author: Mariel

wisdom.quote: I love my old paintings as postulates as fresh starting points but I have to destroy them. I have to make a new manifesto.
wisdom.author: Georg Baselitz

wisdom.quote: CAN is the enemy of DO.
wisdom.author: Alaina Odessa

wisdom.quote: Only be rebellious for good reasons.
wisdom.author: Hannah B (Who is rebellious for everything)

wisdom.quote: A problem well put is half solved.
wisdom.author: John Dewey

wisdom.quote: ...when you put on your shortest dress, please leave some mystery in it. That's the difference between a miniskirt and a ho-skirt. A ho-skirt shows your Frisbee. A miniskirt shows just enough to cause some mystery. What these young women lack is mystery.
wisdom.author: Tyler Perry

wisdom.quote: Any serious social, political, and economic change must include veganism.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: We think a wise person is someone who solves problems. Truth is, a wise person is someone who avoids problems.
wisdom.author: Prem Rawat

wisdom.quote: Yes, Kālāmas, it is proper that your have doubt, that you have perplexity, for a doubt has arisen in a matter which is doubtful. Now, look you Kālāmas, do not be led by reports, or traditions, or hearsay. Be not led by the authority of religious texts, not by the delight in speculative opinions, nor by seeming possibilities, not by the idea: 'this is our teacher'. But, O Kālāmas, when you know for yourself that certain things are unwholesome, and wrong, and bad, then give them up... And when you know for yourself that certain things are wholesome and good, then accept them and follow them.
wisdom.author: The Buddha

wisdom.quote: As in music, when we hear the crescendo building, suddenly if the music stops, we begin to hear the silence as part of the music.
wisdom.author: Chögyam Trungpa

wisdom.quote: Don’t hide what you have just because people tell you it’s not normal. I have known normal people…and guess what? They are as boring as hell...
wisdom.author: Sidney Knight

wisdom.quote: Between the natural way and the path of grace there is a deep abyss. It is in that gap that we live our lives as a giant struggle between good and evil, Satan and God, despair and love. Whenever despair wins, it is the natural way. Whenever love wins, it is a moment of grace. When love is victorious and defeats despair completely, you've reached the path of grace.
wisdom.author: Haim Shapira

wisdom.quote: You cannot live a nonviolent life as long as you are consuming violence. Please consider going vegan.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: The knowing ones must have pity on the ignorant.One who knows is willing to give up his body even for an ant,because he knows that the body is nothing.
wisdom.author: Swami Vivekananda

wisdom.quote: The notion that we should promote "happy" or "humane" exploitation as "baby steps" ignores that welfare reforms do not result in providing significantly greater protection for animal interests; in fact, most of the time, animal welfare reforms do nothing more than make animal exploitation more economically productive by focusing on practices, such as gestation crates, the electrical stunning of chickens, or veal crates, that are economically inefficient in any event. Welfare reforms make animal exploitation more profitable by eliminating practices that are economically vulnerable. For the most part, those changes would happen anyway and in the absence of animal welfare campaigns precisely because they do rectify inefficiencies in the production process. And welfare reforms make the public more comfortable about animal exploitation. The "happy" meat/animal products movement is clear proof of that. We would never advocate for "humane" or "happy" human slavery, rape, genocide, etc. So, if we believe that animals matter morally and that they have an interest not only in not suffering but in continuing to exist, we should not be putting our time and energy into advocating for "humane" or "happy" animal exploitation.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: Speciesism is morally objectionable because, like racism, sexism, and heterosexism, it links personhood with an irrelevant criterion. Those who reject speciesism are committed to rejecting racism, sexism, heterosexism, and other forms of discrimination as well.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: You call forth the world which God has formed and that world only. Nor is this life of yours by which you set such store your doing, however you may choose to tell it. Its shape was forced in the void at the onset and all talk of what might otherwise have been is senseless for there is no otherwise. Of what could it be made? Where be hid? Or how make its appearance? The probability fo the actual is absolute. That we have no power to guess it out beforehand makes it no less certain. That we may imagine alternate histories means nothing at all.
wisdom.author: Cormac McCarthy

wisdom.quote: If we take the position that an assessment that veganism is morally preferable to vegetarianism is not possible because we are all "on our own journey," then moral assessment becomes completely impossible or is speciesist. It is impossible because if we are all "on our own journey," then there is nothing to say to the racist, sexist, anti-semite, homophobe, etc. If we say that those forms of discrimination are morally bad, but, with respect to animals, we are all "on our own journey" and we cannot make moral assessments about, for instance, dairy consumption, then we are simply being speciesist and not applying the same moral analysis to nonhumans that we apply to the human context.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: A fool can easily be known(identified) by what proceeds from his or her mouth.
wisdom.author: Adedayo kingjerry

wisdom.quote: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt of, not swallowed.
wisdom.author: Josh Billings

wisdom.quote: If we still advise we shall never do.
wisdom.author: Elizabeth I

wisdom.quote: If we are ever going to see a paradigm shift, we have to be clear about how we want the present paradigm to shift.We must be clear that veganism is the unequivocal baseline of anything that deserves to be called an "animal rights" movement. If "animal rights" means anything, it means that we cannot morally justify any animal exploitation; we cannot justify creating animals as human resources, however "humane" that treatment may be.We must stop thinking that people will find veganism "daunting" and that we have to promote something less than veganism. If we explain the moral ideas and the arguments in favor of veganism clearly, people will understand. They may not all go vegan immediately; in fact, most won’t. But we should always be clear about the moral baseline. If someone wants to do less as an incremental matter, let that be her/his decision, and not something that we advise to do. The baseline should always be clear. We should never be promoting "happy" or "humane" exploitation as morally acceptable.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: It is by now proverbial that every proverb has its opposite. For every Time is money there is a Stop and smell the roses. When someone says You never stand in the same river twice someone else has already replied There is nothing new under the sun. In the mind's arithmetic, 1 plus -1 equals 2. Truths are not quantities but scripts: Become for a moment the mind in which this is true.
wisdom.author: James Richardson

wisdom.quote: Justru karena cinta, kamu memelihara dirimu dan dirinya agar tetap mulia. Bila ia mendekat, tetaplah duduk. Karena itu yang menjaga emosi agar tak meletup. Bila ia menjauh, jangan dekati dia sebelum waktunya. Sabar itu jauh lebih istimewa. Atau kalau tak tahan lagi, segeralah datang ke rumah orang tuanya! Itu lebih mulia.
wisdom.author: Ahmad Fuady

wisdom.quote: There are some animal advocates who say that to maintain that veganism is the moral baseline is objectionable because it is "judgmental," or constitutes a judgment that veganism is morally preferable to vegetarianism and a condemnation that vegetarians (or other consumers of animal products) are "bad" people. Yes to the first part; no to the second. There is no coherent distinction between flesh and other animal products. They are all the same and we cannot justify consuming any of them. To say that you do not eat flesh but that you eat dairy or eggs or whatever, or that you don’t wear fur but you wear leather or wool, is like saying that you eat the meat from spotted cows but not from brown cows; it makers no sense whatsoever. The supposed "line" between meat and everything else is just a fantasy–an arbitrary distinction that is made to enable some exploitation to be segmented off and regarded as "better" or as morally acceptable. This is not a condemnation of vegetarians who are not vegans; it is, however, a plea to those people to recognize their actions do not conform with a moral principle that they claim to accept and that all animal products are the result of imposing suffering and death on sentient beings. It is not a matter of judging individuals; it is, however, a matter of judging practices and institutions. And that is a necessary component of ethical living.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: We should never present flesh as somehow morally distinguishable from dairy. To the extent it is morally wrong to eat flesh, it is as morally wrong — and possibly more morally wrong — to consume dairy
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: Anyone with half a mind could see that," said Tiffany.Miss Tick sighed. "Yes. But sometimes it's so hard to find half a mind when you need one.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett

wisdom.quote: التحرر من المسؤولية آمام الآخر ليس حرية،ولكنه فرار من الحرية
wisdom.author: إبراهيم الكوني

wisdom.quote: When you can't get what you want, get what you need
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: An abolitionist is, as I have developed that notion, one who (1) maintains that we cannot justify animal use, however "humane" it may be; (2) rejects welfare campaigns that seek more "humane" exploitation, or single-issue campaigns that seek to portray one form of animal exploitation as morally worse than other forms of animal exploitation (e.g., a campaign that seeks to distinguish fur from wool or leather); and (3) regards veganism, or the complete rejection of the consumption or use of any animal products, as a moral baseline. An abolitionist regards creative, nonviolent vegan education as the primary form of activism, because she understands that the paradigm will not shift until we address demand and educate people to stop thinking of animals as things we eat, wear, or use as our resources.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: Free thinker walks on shortcuts among wisdoms.
wisdom.author: Toba Beta

wisdom.quote: If your dreams are to hard to achieve, just achieve
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: The rights paradigm, which, as I interpret it, morally requires the abolition of animal exploitation and requires veganism as a matter of fundamental justice, is radically different from the welfarist paradigm, which, in theory focuses on reducing suffering, and, in reality, focuses on tidying up animal exploitation at its economically inefficient edges. In science, those who subscribe to one paradigm are often unable to understand and engage those who subscribe to another paradigm precisely because the theoretical language that they use is not compatible.I think that the situation is similar in the context of the debate between animal rights and animal welfare. And that is why welfarists simply cannot understand or accept the slavery analogy.
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: Guys willing to hold your dick are a dime a dozen; save your hearts for the one who wants to hold your hand.
wisdom.author: Diane Adams

wisdom.quote: Vulnerability really means to be strong and secure enough within yourself that you are able to walk outside without your armor on. You are able to show up in life as just you. That is genuine strength and courage. Armor may look tough, but all it does is mask insecurity and fear.
wisdom.author: Alaric Hutchinson

wisdom.quote: You can’t selectively numb your anger, any more than you can turn off all lights in a room, and still expect to see the light.
wisdom.author: Shannon L. Alder

wisdom.quote: Bukan melupakan yang jadi masalahnya. Barangsiapa yang bisa menerima, maka dia akan bisa melupakan, hidup bahagia. Tapi jika dia tidak bisa menerima, dia tidak akan pernah bisa melupakan.
wisdom.author: Tere Liye

wisdom.quote: A mother gives you a life, a mother-in-law gives you her life.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: Bukan seberapa lama umat manusia bisa bertahan hidup sebagai ukuran kebahagiaan, tapi seberapa besar kemampuan mereka memeluk erat-erat semua hal menyakitkan yang mereka alami.
wisdom.author: Tere Liye

wisdom.quote: Our ancestors have invented, we can at least innovate.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: Love is being able to view a situation without adding duality to it.
wisdom.author: Alaric Hutchinson

wisdom.quote: We don't notice things change. We know that things change, we've been told since childhood that things change, we've witnessed things change ourselves many a time, and yet we're still utterly incapable of noticing the moment that change comes--or we search for change in all the wrong places.
wisdom.author: Arkady and Boris Strugatsky

wisdom.quote: You were not just blessed for yourself,your were blessed to be a blessing toothers.
wisdom.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

wisdom.quote: Life is the only thing which can never be replaced when lost.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
wisdom.author: Langston Hughes

wisdom.quote: We're very familiar with the idea that some things are so complex they're beyond our comprehension. This not only keeps us solving and experimenting but also distracted. Many things are really so simple we can't see them under our big noses.
wisdom.author: Criss Jami

wisdom.quote: A spoon does not know the taste of soup, nor a learned fool the taste of wisdom.
wisdom.author: Anonymous

wisdom.quote: To struggle against darkness is not to blunder ignorantly; intelligence is needed to generate right action.
wisdom.author: Belsebuub

wisdom.quote: I think that a lot of the time, people are generous towards those whom they pity; but only find fault in those whom they see as better than themselves. There is a fake kind of goodness; and that is the goodness that is only good towards other people that make the givers feel better about themselves. Would you be good to someone you think is so much better than you are? Or who has so much more than you have? Or is your goodness only reserved for those who make you feel like a god because you give to them? Too often, there are shining, beautiful people, who suffer so much in this world, because there would be so many others willing to snuff out their flames! Goodness of a person is not measured by sympathy or compassion; rather, goodness is measured by empathy. Empathy goes beyond all the physical things you see with your two eyes. It’s easy to be good to those you pity; much harder to be good to those whom you envy!
wisdom.author: C. JoyBell C.

wisdom.quote: Compromise brings harmony to both, happiness to none.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: Dirty or clean, crumpled or finely creased, you are still priceless to those who Love you.
wisdom.author: Norlito Baclayen

wisdom.quote: Never underestimate yourself when you do what is right. Never overestimate yourself when you do what is wrong.
wisdom.author: Roy   Bennett

wisdom.quote: When we choose to stay down, we are in reality confusing wisdom with cowardice. When we choose to stand back up, we are using wisdom to overcome cowardice.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Many things can prolong your life, but only wisdom can save it.
wisdom.author: Neel Burton

wisdom.quote: Just as the bird needs wings to fly, a leader needs useful information to flow. Leaders learn.
wisdom.author: Israelmore Ayivor

wisdom.quote: We always need a motivation, in order for us to meet our full potential at work.
wisdom.author: Jayson Engay

wisdom.quote: It is much better to die of hunger unhindered by grief and fear than to live affluently beset with worry, dread, suspicion and unchecked desire.
wisdom.author: Epictetus

wisdom.quote: Wise random strangers at bars are modern-day Oracles of Delphi, except drunk and sometimes leaving abruptly when it's their turn for karaoke.
wisdom.author: Kelly Williams Brown

wisdom.quote: Be your friend’strue friend.Return gift for gift.Repay laughterwith laughter againbut betrayal with treachery.
wisdom.author: Hávamál

wisdom.quote: It's simple, it's not that simple; or life is simple, but the things in it are not. When a man does not understand it, he tends to inflate it. When he does, he tends to deflate it. In the end, neither images are fully accurate.
wisdom.author: Criss Jami

wisdom.quote: O Heavenly Children, God's messengers are as limitless as the fish in the sea. They come in all colors, regions, languages and creeds. But their message is one and the same, don't you see? He only wishes to unite all His children under one family tree.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is not having God's perspective of the whole matter before us, but having God's perspective about what next response will honor Him while keeping us still usable to Him.
wisdom.author: Jim Berg

wisdom.quote: I have learned that the point of life's walk is not where or how far I move my feet but how I am moved in my heart. If I walk far but am angry toward others as I journey, I walk nowhere. If I conquer mountains but hold grudges against others as I climb, I conquer nothing. If I see much but regard others as enemies, I see no one.
wisdom.author: Anasazi Foundation

wisdom.quote: Time throws you out of its dimensionless planar like a boomerang. It unites with you again in death.
wisdom.author: Vishwanath S J

wisdom.quote: We awaken by asking the right questions. We awaken when we see knowledge being spread that goes against our own personal experiences. We awaken when we see popular opinion being wrong but accepted as being right, and what is right being pushed as being wrong. We awaken by seeking answers in corners that are not popular. And we awaken by turning on the light inside when everything outside feels dark.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: True beauty is measured by the number of pearls within you, not those around your neck.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: Expectation has brought me disappointment. Disappointment has brought me wisdom. Acceptance, gratitude and appreciation have brought me joy and fulfilment.
wisdom.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

wisdom.quote: If I stress about a goal, I won't remember to find the way to get there.
wisdom.author: Zoltan Andrejkovics

wisdom.quote: Love is supposed to lift you up, not hold you down. It is supposed to push you forward, not hold you back.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: Wenn du weißt, behaupte, dass du es weißt. Und wenn du etwas nicht weißt, gib zu, dass du es nicht weißt. Das ist Wissen.
wisdom.author: Konfuzius

wisdom.quote: The intriguing placidity from the slothful pace of a snail is truly very peaceful. Our world is in need of this calmness to pacify itself
wisdom.author: Munia Khan

wisdom.quote: The measure of a man is his state of mind.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: We do not engage in idle or intentional gossip which undermines someone else's integrity or which spreads the seeds of fear by talking unthinkingly about illness, disasters, and all the other fears which run rampant in the world.
wisdom.author: Donna Goddard

wisdom.quote: At the end of the day, what is life? A beautiful journey. Why must we take it so seriously and not enjoy every moment of it? Why not let any person have his chance in anything he desires? ...Why not vanish the hate and forgive? Why not follow our dreams and make them reality?
wisdom.author: Maria Karvouni

wisdom.quote: We can't just restrict ourselves to what we know, because we are talking about the unknown.
wisdom.author: Belsebuub

wisdom.quote: Give it air & let the scar on your soul reveal itself, because, like the body, it too was made to heal itself.
wisdom.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

wisdom.quote: The art of decision making includes the art of questioning.
wisdom.author: Pearl Zhu

wisdom.quote: Both the art of intuition and the science of analytics have the role to play in making wise decisions.
wisdom.author: Pearl Zhu

wisdom.quote: Two footsteps do not make a path.
wisdom.author: Nnedi Okorafor

wisdom.quote: If thinking should precede acting, then acting must succeed thinking.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: To lovers there.Most ladies the reason they are dumped and their relationship doesn't last is they made themselves to become a want than a need in a relationship.
wisdom.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

wisdom.quote: Usually people don't see beyond the surface of things and cannot understand more other than the obvious; they are used to judging a book by its cover, and that is why they don't hesitate to bully.
wisdom.author: Maria Karvouni

wisdom.quote: The world has been changing even faster as people, devices and information are increasingly connected to each other. Computational power is growing and quantum computing is quickly being realised. This will revolutionise artificial intelligence with exponentially faster speeds. It will advance encryption. Quantum computers will change everything, even human biology. There is already one technique to edit DNA precisely, called CRISPR. The basis of this genome-editing technology is a bacterial defence system. It can accurately target and edit stretches of genetic code. The best intention of genetic manipulation is that modifying genes would allow scientists to treat genetic causes of disease by correcting gene mutations. There are, however, less noble possibilities for manipulating DNA. How far we can go with genetic engineering will become an increasingly urgent question. We can’t see the possibilities of curing motor neurone diseases—like my ALS—without also glimpsing its dangers.Intelligence is characterised as the ability to adapt to change. Human intelligence is the result of generations of natural selection of those with the ability to adapt to changed circumstances. We must not fear change. We need to make it work to our advantage.We all have a role to play in making sure that we, and the next generation, have not just the opportunity but the determination to engage fully with the study of science at an early level, so that we can go on to fulfil our potential and create a better world for the whole human race. We need to take learning beyond a theoretical discussion of how AI should be and to make sure we plan for how it can be. We all have the potential to push the boundaries of what is accepted, or expected, and to think big. We stand on the threshold of a brave new world. It is an exciting, if precarious, place to be, and we are the pioneers.When we invented fire, we messed up repeatedly, then invented the fire extinguisher. With more powerful technologies such as nuclear weapons, synthetic biology and strong artificial intelligence, we should instead plan ahead and aim to get things right the first time, because it may be the only chance we will get. Our future is a race between the growing power of our technology and the wisdom with which we use it. Let’s make sure that wisdom wins.
wisdom.author: Stephen Hawking

wisdom.quote: Decision making is an art only until the person understands the science.
wisdom.author: Pearl Zhu

wisdom.quote: Luck, I believe, is where preparation meets opportunity.
wisdom.author: Marcella Purnama

wisdom.quote: As great minds have the faculty of saying a great deal in a few words, so lesser minds have a talent of talking much, and saying nothing.
wisdom.author: La Rouchefoucauld

wisdom.quote: Joblessness is a time for reflection
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: For what are in reality the things we call ‘Wisdom,’ ‘Virtue,’ ‘Heroism,’ ‘sublime hours,’ and ‘great moments of life,’ but the moments when we have more or less issued forth from ourselves, and have been able to halt, be it only for an instant, on the step of one of the eternal gates whence we see that the faintest cry, the most colourless thought, and most nerveless gestures do not drop into nothingness; …
wisdom.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

wisdom.quote: Our Peter Pan generation is unhappy. All our lives, we want to grow up—to be treated like adults, to have freedom to choose. Then we get here and it turns out being an adult sucks. We pay the bills and taxes, watching others succeed while we are forever waiting for our turn. We believe we are special, but nothing special has come our way.
wisdom.author: Marcella Purnama

wisdom.quote: The Fur Person learned then and there that it is better to be a philosopher than to be a king and that, all things considered, wisdom was to be preferred to power.
wisdom.author: May Sarton

wisdom.quote: The grass is greener on the other side, but often this is just an illusion. Most probably, everyone is as unhappy as you.
wisdom.author: Marcella Purnama

wisdom.quote: Although history may therefore seem like a series of inevitable events, the actual future is seldom foreseen.
wisdom.author: David G. Myers

wisdom.quote: It's funny how the ugly duckling always has so many beautiful things to teach us.
wisdom.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

wisdom.quote: If you have an opinion, and that opinion is weak, do not consider it wisdom.- Tiresias to Pentheus
wisdom.author: Euripides

wisdom.quote: One thing, all things: move among and intermingle, without distinction. To live in this realization is to be without anxiety about non-perfection. To live in this faith is the road to non-duality, because the non-dual is one with the trusting mind.
wisdom.author: Sengstan

wisdom.quote: There is no dishonor in wisdom.
wisdom.author: James Welch

wisdom.quote: When thought is in bondage the truth is hidden, for everything is murky and unclear, and the burdensome practice of judging brings annoyance and weariness. What benefit can be derived from distinctions and separations?
wisdom.author: Sengstan

wisdom.quote: There are three kind of history. The first is what really happened and that is forever lost. The second is what most people thought happened, and we can recover that with assiduous effort. The third is what the people in power wanted the future to think happened and that is 90 percent of the history in books.
wisdom.author: Michael Gruber

wisdom.quote: For the unified mind in accord with the Way all self-centered striving ceases. Doubts and irresolutions vanish and life in true faith is possible. With a single stroke we are freed from bondage; nothing clings to us and we hold nothing. All is empty, clear, self-illuminating, with no exertion of the mind's power.
wisdom.author: Sengstan

wisdom.quote: A wise person is like a smoothly polished rock: it takes time to become either.
wisdom.author: Vera Nazarian

wisdom.quote: O Lord, I am further away from me than from You!
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: We are often more treacherous through weakness than calculation
wisdom.author: Francois De La Rochefoucault

wisdom.quote: One may enter the literary parlor via just about any door, be it the prison door, the madhouse door, or the brothel door. There is but one door one may not enter it through, which is the child room door. The critics will never forgive you such. The great Rudyard Kipling is one of a number of people to have suffered from this. I keep wondering to myself what this peculiar contempt towards anything related to childhood is all about.
wisdom.author: Michael Ende

wisdom.quote: I was headed for an entire life spent alone, pitying myself for not being more, ignoring all those people who actually ask me to be more, because they see it in me.
wisdom.author: Charles Yu

wisdom.quote: ...a blink of an eye in itself is nothing. But the eye that blinks, that is something.
wisdom.author: Chaim Potok

wisdom.quote: Would that death were like this. Would that one would sleep and sleep and sleep forever.
wisdom.author: Anne Rice

wisdom.quote: We should've been different breeds. There can only be one lion in a small cage. It's not important if the other lion is sleeping or crouching in the corner. The only important thing is that...it's a lion.
wisdom.author: Seyoung Kim

wisdom.quote: Stress the right of the individual to select only what he desires to know, to use any knowledge as he wishes, that he himself owns what he has learned.
wisdom.author: L. Ron Hubbard

wisdom.quote: Can I tell from the twilight from which the world is built that I am a sunrise in this life?
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: ‎your first thought would send the power of Quantum physics into a hive of activity. your first thought, would inevitably become the destiny of the day
wisdom.author: Andre Jordan

wisdom.quote: I would like to believe in the myth that we grow wiser with age. In a sense my disbelief is wisdom. Those of a middle generation, if charitable or sentimental, subscribe to the wisdom myth, while the callous see us as dispensable objects, like broken furniture or dead flowers. For the young we scarcely exist unless we are unavoidable members of the same family, farting, slobbering, perpetually mislaying teeth and bifocals.
wisdom.author: Patrick White

wisdom.quote: How can you be one of the stars of heaven, when the stars are innumerable? What star number do you have?
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: I have more wisdom than any books ever written in history of times, any scripture ever written which you rhyme but this is not my purpose.
wisdom.author: Santosh Kalwar

wisdom.quote: I'll not go where there is any of that sort of thing going on, again. It's the sure way, and the only sure way;
wisdom.author: Mark Twain

wisdom.quote: Let the fear of danger be a spur to prevent it; he that fears not, gives advantage to the danger.
wisdom.author: Francis Quarles

wisdom.quote: ...the wise words of a friend and guide rang in my head. 'How would you distinguish a true servant of God from a traitor?...You should take especial notice of how a person speaks, not of other things, but of God.
wisdom.author: Harry Blamires

wisdom.quote: Putuskan apa yang kau inginkan, dan berusahalah untuk menjadikannya kenyataan. Jangan sampai kau lupa hidup karena terlalu sibuk bermimpi
wisdom.author: Peter O'Connor

wisdom.quote: King Solomon's life reminds meof wisdom, wealth, women, woes.
wisdom.author: Toba Beta

wisdom.quote: How does a woman gain such wisdom in only twenty-nine years?" Gordon asked, escorting her across the lawns toward the mansion."The same way a man does."Which is?"Lady Keely cast him an ambiguous smile. "Either you are born with wisdom, my lord, or you make dowithout it...
wisdom.author: Patricia Grasso

wisdom.quote: Give love, take pride
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: Es decir..., lo que yo creo es que el hombre piensa en el significado de la vida porque sabe con certeza que va morir algún día. (...) Nadie sabe lo que va a ocurrir. Por eso nosotros, para evolucionar necesitamos la muerte.
wisdom.author: Haruki Murakami

wisdom.quote: Huius (sapientis) opus unum est de divinis humanisque verum invenire; ab hac numquam recedit religio, pietas, iustitia ...
wisdom.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

wisdom.quote: Emptiness is this world’s greatest discovery. Who has chosen this kind world for us and why?
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: In every bush lies a nest.
wisdom.author: Kensington Roth

wisdom.quote: The man who makes everything that leads to happiness depends upon himself, and not upon other men, has adopted the very best plan for living happily. This is the man of moderation, the man of manly character and of wisdom.
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: How will you go about finding that thing the nature of which is totally unknown to you?" (Plato) The things we want are transformative, and we don’t know or only think we know what is on the other side of that transformation. Love, wisdom, grace, inspiration- how do you go about finding these things that are in some ways about extending the boundaries of the self into unknown territory, about becoming someone else?
wisdom.author: Rebecca Solnit

wisdom.quote: Limitation of one's freedom might seem to be something negative and unpleasant, but love makes it a positive, joyful and creative thing. Freedom exists for the sake of love.
wisdom.author: John Paul II

wisdom.quote: A mind set in its ways is wasted. Don't do it.
wisdom.author: Eric Schmidt

wisdom.quote: We shouldn't have been so scornful; we should have had compassion. But compassion takes work, and we were young.
wisdom.author: Margaret Atwood

wisdom.quote: Those who have wisdom have all:Fools with all have nothing.
wisdom.author: Tiruvalluvar

wisdom.quote: Men grow tired of sleep, love, singing and dancing, sooner than war.
wisdom.author: Homer

wisdom.quote: If I reveal myself without worrying about how others will respond, then some will care, though others may not. But who can love me, if no one knows me? I must risk it, or live alone.
wisdom.author: Sheldon B. Kopp

wisdom.quote: You got up off the bathroom floor. That’s a start. Now, just stay off the floor. After all—aside from winning the lottery—all any of us can ever really hope for is more days spent standing tall than spent in pieces on the floor.
wisdom.author: Sarah Spann

wisdom.quote: One says the things which one feels the need to say, and which the other will not understand: one speaks for oneself alone.
wisdom.author: Marcel Proust

wisdom.quote: Did you have a rough month? I did :( but, you know what? There’s no time to dwell on a missed opportunity or worry about what I should’ve done or said, beating myself up & making myself miserable about my mistakes. That doesn’t work. So will take notes from that, put it behind me, move on & finish the year STRONG
wisdom.author: Pablo

wisdom.quote: The distance between your knowledge of truth and your obedience is called lack of integrity. And the amount of negative behavior--or lack of integrity--a person exhibits is directly proportional to their amount of pain." - Tara Leigh's therapist (p.118)
wisdom.author: Tara Leigh Cobble

wisdom.quote: We are exactly where we have chosen to be.
wisdom.author: Vernon Howard

wisdom.quote: Lifes like a painters palette, just when you've got everything worked out the colours change
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: Никога не съм позволявал на училището да попречи на образованието ми.
wisdom.author: Mark Twain

wisdom.quote: Science says the first word on everything, and the last word on nothing.
wisdom.author: Victor Hugo

wisdom.quote: Children are the closest we have to wisdom, and they become adults the moment that final drop of everything mysterious is strained from them.
wisdom.author: Simon Van Booy

wisdom.quote: The art of peaceful living comes down to living compassionately & wisely.
wisdom.author: Allan Lokos

wisdom.quote: We must accept the reality that the causes of impatience travel a two-way street.
wisdom.author: Allan Lokos

wisdom.quote: Sometimes the only way to succeed is to fail backwards
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: Patience is a natural consequence of the cultivation of compassion & love, for ourselves and all beings.
wisdom.author: Allan Lokos

wisdom.quote: أحياناً نقود أنفسنا للطريق المهلك علماً بذلك .. ليس رغبة بالهلاك، بل أملاً بتغيير النتيجة
wisdom.author: Ms.Candy

wisdom.quote: Only to the degree that people have what they need, that they are healthy and unafraid, that their lives are varied, interesting, meaningful, productive, joyous, can we begin to judge, or even guess, their nature. Few people, adults or children, now live such lives.
wisdom.author: John Holt

wisdom.quote: Authoritarian, paralyzing, circular, occasionally elliptical stock phrases, also jocularly referred to as nuggets of wisdom, are a malignant plague, one of the very worst ever to ravage the earth.
wisdom.author: José Saramago

wisdom.quote: Giving is the only way of taking part
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: If those at your top are weak, your bottom will be rotten
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: The essence of successful discipline is not technique; rather, it is self-confidence.
wisdom.author: John Rosemond

wisdom.quote: Human nature is all alike.
wisdom.author: Mark Twain

wisdom.quote: Desire is the seed of potential.
wisdom.author: Alaina Odessa

wisdom.quote: I let all that anger and worry go because they don't belong to me any more than the future does. And I don't wanna feel them anyhow, because the truth is, whatever happens when this war ends, here and now, far from Richmond County, I'm freer than I've ever been.
wisdom.author: Teresa R. Funke

wisdom.quote: Easily mistaken, it is not about a love for adversity, it is about knowing a strength and a faith so great that adversity, in all its adverse manifestations, hardly even exists.
wisdom.author: Criss Jami

wisdom.quote: Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech.
wisdom.author: Plutarch

wisdom.quote: If you are what you eat, you are what you see and hear.
wisdom.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

wisdom.quote: A soul that is kind and intends justice discovers more than any sophist
wisdom.author: Sophocles

wisdom.quote: Wisdom comes from reflection.
wisdom.author: Deborah Day

wisdom.quote: Love will never let you down, if you don't give it up
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: One is often so busy doing life that it is easy to avoid evaluating whether you are putting your energy in the direction you value most.
wisdom.author: Deborah Day

wisdom.quote: Ability, experience and books have solution for all the problems.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: Anyway, the trick is simply this: No matter what happens, keep your heart open. Wide open. The heart is made of love, and love is indestructible, and only the arrogance of ego would presume that it requires protection. To open your heart is to reduce your ego, and this is the only magic that is ever required to experience the naked truth.
wisdom.author: Tony Vigorito

wisdom.quote: There's always something when you're at fault, too, and that fault you must discover and learn to recognize and take the consequences of it.
wisdom.author: Anne Holm

wisdom.quote: But Johannes had said, "Politeness is something you owe other people, because when you show a little courtesy, everything becomes easier and better. But first and foremost, it's something you owe yourself. You are David.
wisdom.author: Anne Holm

wisdom.quote: Indeed if fish had fish-lore and Wise-fish, it is probable that the business of anglers would be very little hindered.
wisdom.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

wisdom.quote: God grant ... that he may learn to understand in time, that whoso is minded to do as he himself wills will soon enough see the day when he will find he has done that which he had never willed.
wisdom.author: Sigrid Undset

wisdom.quote: I see at last that all the knowledgeI wrung from the darkness—that the darkness flung me—Is worthless as ignorance: nothing comes from nothing,The darkness from the darkness. Pain comes from the darknessAnd we call it wisdom. It is pain.
wisdom.author: Randall Jarrell

wisdom.quote: Your youth is certainly finished and old age has definitely arrived if you feel that you are losing enthusiasm, excitement and energy towards your dreams and goals.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: The greatest solution of all is to live and work in partnership with yourself, your family and friends, your work and community, your nation, your world, nature, and spirit.
wisdom.author: Marc Allen

wisdom.quote: Entering a cell, penetrating deep as a flying saucer to find a new galaxy would be an honorable task for a new scientist interested more in the inner state of the soul than in outer space.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: His strength for your weakness! His wisdom for your folly! His drive for your drift! His grace for your greed! His love for your lust! His peace for your problems! His joy for your sorrow! His plenty for your poverty!
wisdom.author: Major Thomas

wisdom.quote: If you change who you are to suit other people, you may end up dressed for the wrong occasion
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: Wisdom must yield to superstition's rules,Who arms with bigot zeal the hand of fools.
wisdom.author: Voltaire

wisdom.quote: You can change your mind, don't let your mind change you
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: I don't know what to say to fill the silence. I don't know how to fix this. It seems wrong to leave him, but I have to. There's no compromise, no alternative. Things just weren't meant to be, which seems like a pansy-ass thing to say, until it happens to you.
wisdom.author: H.M. Ward

wisdom.quote: لو كان العقل على قدر كلام الرجل، لكان الثرثار أكبر الناس عقلاً، ولو كان العلم على قدر حفظ المسائل لكان التلميذ أوسع من أستاذه علماً، ولو كان الجاه على قدر الفضائل لما كان للأشرار نفوذ، ولو كان المال على قدر العقل لكان أغنى الناس الحكماء، وأفقر الناس السفهاء، ولو كان الخلود على قدر نفع الناس لما خلد السفاحون والطغاة وأكثر الملوك والزعماء.
wisdom.author: مصطفى السباعي

wisdom.quote: ولكن ما كانت الصداقة لتحمل في يدها ميزان العدل لكل كلمة وكل معنى وكل إشارة،بل إنها لتصفح كثي ا ر عن كثير لتجعل الحق الذي لها أن تستوفيه كاملا كأنها حق عليهاتؤديه كاملا فتكبر بتسامحها وتنمو…
wisdom.author: مصطفى صادق الرافعي

wisdom.quote: Between natural ability and education choose natural ability, as it will keep you happy and will fetch you the glory sooner.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: Its not how strong you are, its how firm your footing is.
wisdom.author: Clive Ollies

wisdom.quote: Feel not obliged to make good use of every ripe fruit on the vine.
wisdom.author: Kathryn  Hall

wisdom.quote: A wise man is able to differentiate between humility and weakness, he does not mistake courage for pride.
wisdom.author: Newton Gatambia

wisdom.quote: Seek out your superiors and learn from them. Do not hide nor shy away from them for the sake of your pride for true pride is perceived, not in perceived skill, but in improvement.
wisdom.author: Megan  Webster

wisdom.quote: One's rebuke engraves itself upon the mind more than one's praise.
wisdom.author: Seth D.

wisdom.quote: UNDIVIDEDI am for One world undivided. One world without fear and corruption. One world ruled by Truth and Justice. I am forOne peaceful world for all,Where hate has been overcome by love,And everyone is guided only By their conscience.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: Be honest. This applies to every area of your life. Sketchiness is not an attractive trait. No more trying to cover up your baggage, sweeping things under the rug, withholding truth, blatant lying, or even telling seemingly ‘harmless’ white lies or half-truths – release the need to lie completely! Start NOW.
wisdom.author: Alaric Hutchinson

wisdom.quote: SAYING OF SHEIKH ZIAUDIN:Self-justification is worse than the original offence.
wisdom.author: Idries Shah

wisdom.quote: Do your thoughts continue and repeat a cycle Seed, growth, bloom, and seed again
wisdom.author: Richard L.  Ratliff

wisdom.quote: It’s all about reprogramming our minds to focus more on what brings us joy.
wisdom.author: Alaric Hutchinson

wisdom.quote: The question is: do you want suffering or do you want peace? It's that simple.
wisdom.author: Donna Goddard

wisdom.quote: Old people have wisdom but not energy; young people have energy but not wisdom; energy and wisdom must be in the same body to create a much better civilisation! To do this, we will either give energy to the old or we will give wisdom to the young and for now the latter seems a more plausible action!
wisdom.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

wisdom.quote: In my experience, it is always worth it to find the love that lives inside you. No matter how deep you have to dig sometimes.
wisdom.author: Scott Stabile

wisdom.quote: The science of decision-making is to make sure there is an effective decision process in place.
wisdom.author: Pearl Zhu

wisdom.quote: A genuine smile is one of the world’s rarest treasures.
wisdom.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

wisdom.quote: To fully communicate with people, you need to find tactics that would interest them
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: Show the youth the consequences of their actions and why they should choose wisely
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: Confident Assured Posture: Foundation of Powerful Style
wisdom.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

wisdom.quote: Don't feel the need to vent or complain, no matter how badly you would like to express your feelings. When it comes to speaking of those in power, always think of the consequences. Think about how those around you will perceive what you have to say. Will what you say be of advantage to you or will it hurt you in the end?
wisdom.author: Bohdi Sanders

wisdom.quote: Misery builds character, happiness makes cheesecake.
wisdom.author: Abhijit Naskar

wisdom.quote: THREE BASIC TRUTHSThree things have a limited threshold: Time, pain, and death.While truth, love, and knowledge –Are boundless.Three things are needed For humanity to co-exist:Truth, peace and basic needs.Everything else -Is irrelevant.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: Use time to create the nature of God in yourself
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: There is a depth to life which only comes from our connection to other people. However, we have to find it without becoming a prisoner.
wisdom.author: Donna Goddard

wisdom.quote: Opportunities to share love and compassion are all around us. Its going to take an army of compassionate people to heal our world. How will you show yours?
wisdom.author: Renae A. Sauter

wisdom.quote: Knowing what to do with time is the first step to take when you lose your job
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: If you read proverbs, you will find answers to every puzzle.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Knowing what to do with time is the key to being productive
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: Happiness is heaven in human heart.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: You need to use the instrument that the people desire to captivate them back to things that are right
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: I believe that this is the time to become warriors for peace and dialogue, not warmongers or mere worriers.
wisdom.author: Lama Surya Das

wisdom.quote: When one feels oneself smitten by love for a woman, one ought to say to oneself, "What are her surroundings? What has been her life? All one’s future happiness lies in the answer.
wisdom.author: Marcel Proust

wisdom.quote: In addition to my new outlook on life, in some absurdly simple way, Anissa gave me several new reasons to live. Above all, I had to see her again and find out what, if anything, would happen between her and me.
wisdom.author: Zack Love

wisdom.quote: I speak of the Creator. Are you surprised by my candor? In a world that has killed the sacred, mention of it can seem shocking, even foolhardy. But how foolhardy it is to kill the sacred! And how shocking to think that we could! For there is always a light that walks forward.
wisdom.author: Anasazi Foundation

wisdom.quote: Ego is like cyanide. Instantly kills dialogue. Always needs to be kept satisfied.
wisdom.author: PRASOON

wisdom.quote: To be productive, effective and to live a life of understanding and wisdom is not to waste time
wisdom.author: Sunday Adelaja

wisdom.quote: To live content with small means; to seek elegance rather than luxury, and refinement rather than fashion; to be worthy, not respectable, and wealthy, not, rich; to listen to stars and birds, babes and sages, with open heart; to study hard; to think quietly, act frankly, talk gently, await occasions, hurry never; in a word, to let the spiritual, unbidden and unconscious, grow up through the common. this is my symphony.
wisdom.author: William Ellery Channing

wisdom.quote: To deny the reality of things is to miss their reality; to assert the emptiness of things is to miss their reality. The more you talk and think about it, the further astray you wander from the truth. Stop talking and thinking and there is nothing you will not be able to know.
wisdom.author: Sengstan

wisdom.quote: It is useful to study different traditions in order to be free of attachment to any one way of expressing what is beyond expression. (x)
wisdom.author: Ravi Ravindra

wisdom.quote: Tennis taught me so many lessons in life. One of the things it taught me is that every ball that comes to me, I have to make a decision. I have to accept responsibility for the consequences every time I hit a ball.
wisdom.author: Billie Jean King

wisdom.quote: A philosopher is a lover of wisdom, not of knowledge, which for all its great uses ultimately suffers from the crippling effect of ephemerality. All knowledge is transient linked to the world around it and subject to change as the world changes, whereas wisdom, true wisdom is eternal immutable. To be philosophical one must love wisdom for its own sake, accept its permanent validity and yet its perpetual irrelevance. It is the fate of the wise to understand the process of history and yet never to shape it.
wisdom.author: Shashi Tharoor

wisdom.quote: Whoever is full of wisdom is naturally compassionate; in fact we recognize that someone has gained spiritual wisdom by seeing their compassionate behavior. . . . Individuals and countries with power need to develop wisdom and compassion, for without these attributes, there is a danger that the power will be used to oppress and exploit others. (31)
wisdom.author: Ravi Ravindra

wisdom.quote: One true king knew when to step aside and give up the reins of power—to remove his crown and relinquish his kingdom—all for the sake of glimpsing, just once in a lifetime, the face of a holy child.He was the Fourth to follow the Star.His gift was a secret.The rest of his journey is unknown.
wisdom.author: Vera Nazarian

wisdom.quote: If a serious statement is defined as one that may be made in terms of waking life, poetry will never rise to the level of seriousness. It lies beyond seriousness, on that more primitive and original level where the child, the animal, the savage, and the seer belong, in the region of dream, enchantment, ecstasy, laughter. To understand poetry we must be capable of donning the child's soul like a magic cloak and of forsaking man's wisdom for the child's.
wisdom.author: Johan Huizinga

wisdom.quote: All simple souls must admire and respect one another, saying: 'Let us proceed each one along our path to the same goal, united in purpose and by means of God's order which, in its great variety, is in us all.
wisdom.author: Jean-Pierre de Caussade

wisdom.quote: Any man who has got himself set over others and don't have any responsibility to something bigger than him is a son of a bitch.
wisdom.author: Oakley Hall

wisdom.quote: In examinations the foolish ask questions that the wise cannot answer.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.quote: We are much beholden to Machiavelli and others, that write what men do, and not what they ought to do . For it is not possible to join serpentine wisdom with the columbine innocency, except men know exactly all the conditions of the serpent; his baseness and going upon his belly, his volubility and lubricity, his envy and sting, and the rest; that is, all forms and natures of evil. For without this, virtue lieth open and unfenced. Nay, an honest man can do no good upon those that are wicked, to reclaim them, without the help of the knowledge of evil.
wisdom.author: Frances Bacon

wisdom.quote: God teaches the soul by pains and obstacles, not by ideas.
wisdom.author: Jean-Pierre de Caussade

wisdom.quote: [...] marriage is one thing, and love is another...You need to have a solid canvas; nobody stops you to weave the arabesques...
wisdom.author: Andre Maurois

wisdom.quote: When two wise men are blaming one another,then time has come for you to be the third one.
wisdom.author: Toba Beta

wisdom.quote: ...freedom can be a full-time job if you let it.
wisdom.author: Pearl Cleage

wisdom.quote: Do not ever go out of yourself because you will get lost even from your life.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: No shortcut to wisdom.No tollways to be wise.
wisdom.author: Toba Beta

wisdom.quote: Every life has a destiny... the trick is to discover it before then end of your life. Otherwise, you will have too many regrets.
wisdom.author: Kevin J. Anderson

wisdom.quote: A primary requirement in every enterprise in habit-formation is self-confidence.
wisdom.author: Ralph Alfred Habas

wisdom.quote: Man will never reach the higher wisdom,If he can't yet accept the pain of change.
wisdom.author: Toba Beta

wisdom.quote: If the moment is everthing, then everything is time.
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: I wrote "David" because it seemed to me that children, who can love a book more passionately than any grown person, got such a lot of harmless entertainment and not enough real, valuable literature.
wisdom.author: Anne Holm

wisdom.quote: . . . I had found the edge. The place where you unstrap all your fastenings to the earth, to what you are what you have been, where you flame out on the edge of the spheres, and the sun and moon become eclipsed and the world below is as dead and remote and without interest as if it were glazed with ice.
wisdom.author: James Lee Burke

wisdom.quote: The perfection of wisdom, and the end of true philosophy is to proportion our wants to our possessions, our ambitions to our capacities, we will then be a happy and a virtuous people.
wisdom.author: Mark Twain

wisdom.quote: Whoever lost the truth has lost him/her self.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: To be beyond yourself is the gate to wisdom.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Guts are important. Your guts are what digest things. But it is your brains that tell you which things to swallow and which not to swallow.
wisdom.author: Austin Dacey

wisdom.quote: If we deny the thirst of love, we stand to lose the last known address of the stranger whithin us.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Die Welt ist von Narren geschaffen, damit Weise in ihr Leben.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.quote: Normalization takes place not because there is Western-ideology that normalizes third-world texts in any special way (other than the usual play with exoticism) but because this academic seeks to domesticate everything, even Marx.
wisdom.author: Aijaz Ahmad

wisdom.quote: Courteous people learn courtesy from the discourteous
wisdom.author: Laura Fitzgerald

wisdom.quote: Go to any small village anywhere in the world, and see what they remember. Everything. It's all there -- passed on like a precious piece of information, some secret imparted from one who knew to one who yearns to know. Taken good care of.
wisdom.author: Alexander McCall Smith

wisdom.quote: Wisdom most of the time takes form of advice.
wisdom.author: Veda Catherine Storey

wisdom.quote: Ohne Gedankenfreiheit gibt es keine Weisheit. Und ohne Redefreiheit keine öffentliche Freiheit.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: The meaning of the words is necessary and not their extent.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Ihr redet, wenn ihr aufhört mit euren Gedanken in Frieden zu sein.
wisdom.author: Khalil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Is there anyone that knows the absolute truth?
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: This is the best possible way to retain important details that you wish to remember in any unified field of knowledge, whether it be the field of economics, science, history, or any other--link them up with related items which you already know or wouldn't mind knowing.
wisdom.author: Ralph Alfred Habas

wisdom.quote: Weisheit kann Angst nicht bannen, Angst jedoch kann Weisheit bannen.
wisdom.author: Mahabharata. Bhagavadgita. English.

wisdom.quote: She had stayed home and worked hard and a posthumous recognition had eventually followed. Not that Buck hadn't worked hard, sure he did, but in the end the body won't hold up as a work of art.
wisdom.author: Duff Brenna

wisdom.quote: We should all have the freedom to die with majesty in an unworthy life which was subjected to sin and vanity.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: To breath through the truth is not the same with knowing it.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: The truth can only be absolute as any relativity may include the untruth towards the system of reference where it varies.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Before big bridges, deep tunnels and the advent of health and safety regulations, there were many ways to cross rivers. They would use rowing boats, rickety rafts or in the absence of a vessel, swim or wade. Everyone knew what a stepping-stone was. They all understood that it was not something that you would want to stand on for any length of time. It was a means to an end, an important point and a route from A to B.
wisdom.author: Johnathan Cainer

wisdom.quote: Umgangsformen sind Formen, die zunehmend umgangen werden.
wisdom.author: Oliver Hassencamp

wisdom.quote: Our entire life worth's less than one moment of the absolute's truth vanity.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Without the absolute truth, to know the truth value of our own existence is beyond our strengths/limits/possibilities.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Wisdom’s Pearl doth often dwellClosed in Fancy’s rainbow shell
wisdom.author: John Sterling

wisdom.quote: We are beings only in the extent of Our Life's Illusion.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: To be is the greatest paradox of life facing death.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: The well of your soul will not experience the drought until in front of her will appear the moment of eternity to drink from the water of death.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Die Einsicht eines Menschen verleiht ihre Flügel keinem anderen.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: We are certainly descendents of the sea for our tears are salted and when we shed them on the jowl of time, the sea that has always been within us flows on our face.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Believing in what you don't know is as true as believing in what you know as long as your life is just an illusion.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: Wenn [der Lehrer] wirklich weise ist, fordert er euch nicht auf, ins Haus seiner Weisheit einzutreten, sondern führt euch an die Schwelle eures eigenen Geistes.
wisdom.author: Khalil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Aus Lügen, die wir glauben, werden Wahrheiten, mit denen wir leben.
wisdom.author: Oliver Hassencamp

wisdom.quote: Immer wieder behauptete Unwahrheiten werden nicht zu Wahrheiten, sondern, was schlimmer ist, zu Gewohnheiten.
wisdom.author: Oliver Hassencamp

wisdom.quote: TO BE is life's dilemma while facing the eternity of death.
wisdom.author: Sorin Cerin

wisdom.quote: You'll know that you're aligned with the truth of your deepest wisdom when your body feels light and expansive. You'll know when something isn't right for you because you'll feel constricted, awkward, fidgety, tense, or edgy.
wisdom.author: Kris Franken

wisdom.quote: ... what you think is right isn't the same as knowing what is right.
wisdom.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

wisdom.quote: The way you see people is the way you treat them and the way you treat them is what they become.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: Даже и най-скъпият часовник има само 60 минути в час
wisdom.author: Чудомир

wisdom.quote: A noble leader answers not to the trumpet calls of self promotion, but to the hushed whispers of necessity.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: In science, mistakes always precede the truth.
wisdom.author: Horace Walpole

wisdom.quote: Cara: I used to believe everything my brother told me, because he was older and I figured he knew more about the world. But as it turns out, being a grown-up doesn't mean you're fearless. It just means you fear different things.
wisdom.author: Jodi Picoult

wisdom.quote: High above the noise and fear mongering of critics and cynics softly speaks your true self.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: Your greatest responsibility is to live a life that nourishes your highest truth.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: Whatever can be threatened, whatever can be shaken, whatever you fear cannot stand, is destined to crash. Do not go down with the ship. Let that which is destined to become the past slip away. Believe that the real you is that which beckons from the future. If it is a sadder you, it will be a wiser one. And dawn will follow the darkness sooner or later. Rebirth can never come without death.
wisdom.author: Robert M. Price

wisdom.quote: A wise teacher learns in the midst of teaching; a wise student teaches in the midst of learning.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: Yesterday I was clever,That is why I wanted to change the world.Today I am wise,That is why I am changing myself.
wisdom.author: Sri Chinmoy

wisdom.quote: There is no adversity that cannot bear a gift and no gift that cannot bring adversity.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: ...it is never safe to classify the souls of one's neighbors; one is apt, in the long run, to be proved a fool. You should regard each meeting with a friend as a sitting he is unwillingly giving you for a portrait -- a portrait that, probably, when you or he die, will still be unfinished. And, though this is an absorbing pursuit, nevertheless, the painters are apt to end pessimists. For however handsome and merry may be the face, however rich the background, in the first rough sketch of each portrait, yet with every added stroke of the brush, with every tiny readjustment of the 'values,' with every modification of the chiaroscuro, the eyes looking out at you grow more disquieting. And, finally, it is your own face that you are staring at in terror, as in a mirror by candle-light, when all the house is still.
wisdom.author: Hope Mirrlees

wisdom.quote: To recognize our bias toward error should teach us modesty and reflection, and to forgive it should help us avoid the inhumanity of thinking we ourselves are not as fallible as those who, in any instance, seem most at fault. Science can give us knowledge, but it cannot give us wisdom. Nor can religion, until it puts aside nonsense and distraction and becomes itself again.
wisdom.author: Marilynne Robinson

wisdom.quote: Man was designed in a way in which he must eat in order to give him a solid reason to go to work everyday. This helps to keep him out of trouble. God is wise.
wisdom.author: Criss Jami

wisdom.quote: Freedom flourishes upon the bedrock of ethics and integrity.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: Mastery is the breeding ground of fresh, creative passion.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: Our physical world seems ready and able to accommodate the needs of the spiritually awakened new Superhuman. The constraints or demands of our material world are not the real problem; it is our own spiritual awareness and philosophical wisdom that is lagging behind.
wisdom.author: Anthon St. Maarten

wisdom.quote: If she could no longer be called beautiful, she possessed something better-a knowledge of beauty; it’s inflated value, it’s inevitable loss.
wisdom.author: Hilary Thayer Hamann

wisdom.quote: There was a considerable difference between the ages of my parents, but this circumstance seemed to unite them only closer in bonds of devoted affection.
wisdom.author: Mary Shelley

wisdom.quote: Magic is a dangerous thing, child. It isn’t something to use lightly.
