wisdom.quote: It’s like a dance. And we have to give each being space to dance their dance. Everything is dancing; even the molecules inside the cells are dancing. But we make our lives so heavy. We have these incredibly heavy burdens we carry with us like rocks in a big rucksack. We think that carrying this big heavy rucksack is our security; we think it grounds us. We don’t realize the freedom, the lightness of just dropping it off, letting it go. That doesn’t mean giving up relationships; it doesn’t mean giving up one’s profession, or one’s family,or one’s home. It has nothing to do with that; it’s not an external change. It’s an internal change. It’s a change from holding on tightly to holding very lightly.– Tenzin Palmofrom the book "Into The Heart Of Life
wisdom.author: Tenzin Palmo

wisdom.quote: Launch out into the deep, there is large deposit of divine things.

wisdom.quote: The Massachusetts constitution states that "Wisdom and knowledge, as well as virtue, diffused generally among the body of people [are] necessary for the preservation of their rights and liberties." wisdom.author: Vindy Teja

wisdom.quote: Anyone can pursue great things. But, it is the wise person who, having exhausted themselves in the pursuit of great things, is able to surrender such a pursuit having finally recognized that small things are the great things.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Technological prowess does not guarantee social wisdom.
wisdom.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

wisdom.quote: To be humble in heart is to receive the honour of being happy.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Without painful evolution, there is no precious change.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Endure labour; nor to need many things; when I have anything to do, to do it myself rather than by others; not to meddle with many businesses; and not easily to admit of any slander.
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: When you think about it, it's all well and good living a life so clean, it would even put a saint to shame, but sure god knows you might as well live it up, enjoy your few cigarettes, your few drinks, your desserts, or whatever your vice may be. Death doesn't discriminate or favour those who live healthy lives. It will take anyone, anytime, so you might as well go with a smile on your face.
wisdom.author: Michael Healy-Rae

wisdom.quote: Not to be offended with other men's liberty of speech.
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: Not to contemn any friend's expostulation, though unjust, but to strive to reduce him to his former disposition
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: There is nothing better than to share bread with your brother.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: A man is never mightier than his Maker.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: We do not hold the solution to our problems, unless we see the destruction of ourselves as the solution to our problems.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Ignorance is a deep darkness. But false knowledge is total darkness.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: There is no good life without good knowledge.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The wisest thing that we can acknowledge is that we are not. The second wisest thing we can acknowledge is that God is. And the third wisest thing we can acknowledge is our need to surrender ourselves to both.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is of the soul, is not susceptible of proof, is its own proof.
wisdom.author: Walt Whitman

wisdom.quote: To incessantly define ‘where we’re at’ as a means of convincing ourselves that we know ‘where we’re at’ suggests that we’re lost about being lost. And while the wilderness of life is teeming with these kinds of people, I have to make certain that I never enter the woods.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Wisdom apart from God is just a word.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Don’t confuse the ‘idea’ of a cure with an actual cure, for our culture is dying the death of ideas in the absence of cures.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: The Bible is not a book on how to live your life. It’s a book on how to live above your life.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Endeavor to have power of myself, and in nothing to be carried about; to be cheerful and courageous in all sudden chances and accidents, as in sicknesses: to love mildness, and moderation, and gravity: and to do my business, whatsoever it be, thoroughly, and without querulousness.
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: Ignorance is no justification for ill-conceived actions. When one doesn't know or has doubts it's best to seek advice.
wisdom.author: Andrzej Sapkowski

wisdom.quote: Ego love is often tied in with condition, suffering, fear, and angst. Divine Love is unconditional and free.
wisdom.author: Tara Bianca

wisdom.quote: Girls know the value of a good secret.
wisdom.author: A.D. Aliwat

wisdom.quote: Black females, for the most part, know by the time they are ten years old that the world is not much concerned with the quality of their lives or even their lives at all. When politicians and salespeople start being kind to black women, seeking them out, offering them largesse, the women accept the soft voices, the simpering statements, the often idle promises, because those are likely to be the only flattering behavior directed to them that day. Behind the women's eyes, however, there is a wisdom that does not pretend to be unaware; nor does it permit gullibility.
wisdom.author: Maya Angelou

wisdom.quote: We have known what it is to have had a gift, and have not ever questioned from where the gift came, only sometimes wondered. The gift has not been taken away because gifts are legacies, that once given cannot be taken away. They may pass from hand to hand, but once held they are always yours. The gift we were given is with us still.
wisdom.author: Patricia Grace

wisdom.quote: Let the soul speak from within, it is God's grace and blessing, listen to it, breathe with it and smile.
wisdom.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

wisdom.quote: Rejection means you're now available for much better!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Hearing about any single human life lost anywhere in the world should never ever become old news.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: A long time ago, I learned to only share my war stories (I have many) with people with whom I feel a genuine and deep human connection. These stories are at once precious and painful – they need to be earned. They must be deserved by those who hear them.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: Truth is the thing that protects me from chasing the stuff that will rather quickly end up chasing me.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: If God didn’t design the road, you can be assured that it’s a very short path to a really steep cliff.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: The consequence of thinking that we can avoid a consequence is something akin to believing that jumping off a cliff only involves the jumping.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: We're all monsters. We all play a role in someone else's tragic story.
wisdom.author: Emily A. Myers

wisdom.quote: We gain knowledge by going through life, education, reading and other learning techniques. And with this knowledge we are now able to imagine.
wisdom.author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1996

wisdom.quote: Protect your mind and guard your heart from negative influences.
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: NOTHING BETTER THAN SITTING IN A PUB, LOOKING OUT OF THE WINDOW AT ANOTHER PUB, TO WORK OUT WHERE YOU'RE GOING IN LIFE.
wisdom.author: Benny Bellamacina

wisdom.quote: Celebrate worship, practice acceptance of truth and wisdom, and we all may choose peaceful options, many thanks.
wisdom.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

wisdom.quote: Have an attitude of gratitude and see good things keep coming your way!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Senseless of stubbornness leads to sin.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Normally, I observe that the worse the quality of one's existence (as assessed by the subject himself), the greater the propensity to offer others pearls of wisdom about how life is and how it should be lived and, on average, to expect them to be collected.
wisdom.author: Luigina Sgarro

wisdom.quote: Know your worth. Embrace that you are worthy of receiving that great blessing in your life!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: I heard this story about a fish, he swims up to an older fish and says: ‘I’m trying to find this thing they call the ocean.’ ‘The ocean?’ the older fish says, ‘that’s what you’re in right now.’ ‘This’, says the young fish, ‘this is water. What I want is the ocean!
wisdom.author: disney pixar

wisdom.quote: The only thing you must hate is evil.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: None of the power of the world can defeat you, until and unless you give up.
wisdom.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

wisdom.quote: Seek wisdom from the sages, justice is waiting at the gate. Freedom is for all ages. Read the scriptures, to see the true picture.
wisdom.author: Ora Bigio

wisdom.quote: We learn things when we read and we travel to many places...No trip will be more meaningful, more magical, more exciting than the trip you take alone with a book and your imagination.
wisdom.author: Sandra Montanino

wisdom.quote: There's a realityI never understoodThere's a worldBetter than thisI'll show itBecause I believeIn miracles
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I often find God’s great wisdom outside of His Holy word in the world around me being often strange and wonderful at the same time teaching me that nature has a similarity with the grace of God.
wisdom.author: John M. Sheehan

wisdom.quote: Any wise man fears open spitefulness, whether it be in seriousness or in jest.
wisdom.author: Chrétien de Troyes

wisdom.quote: We welcome the New Year with a change of heart.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Mathematics is a wonderful common sense! To understand the harmony in its nature magnificent this wondrous language, abundantly rich in terms of matter and manner, calls for cleverness to manoeuvre through the complexities. Finally it is all wisdom.
wisdom.author: Priyavrat Thareja

wisdom.quote: Probably more than anything, our priorities tell us how much of a priority we’ve placed upon thinking about what our priorities should be before we decided that they should be our priorities. And for many of us, it’s rather apparent that our priority was anything but thinking.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Elara shook her head. "I’m not afraid. I know I was born to do this.
wisdom.author: Dana Gricken

wisdom.quote: Dreams are nurtured and supported by daily uninteresting job; they never support themselves at the beginning but at the end. So do not quit your daily job too early, it might be the only resource your dream needs.
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: To win, you must be warrior.w
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Enlightened beings, they become one with the Cosmos, that is the ultimate experience, but not final, because Ultimate itself is constantly alive, not carved in stone! Ultimate is not carved in stone, it is a powerful happening. It is a constant happening! Every time I fall into Samadhi, I just know I am pregnant with billions of planets. I am just pregnant with billions of planets. Understand, when I say I am pregnant with billions of planets, means, I am constantly delivering, delivering, delivering. Swallowing billions and delivering billions. Infinity! Cosmos, is a happening. It is not a dead state. It is a alive, living, happening!~Ishavasya Upanishad
wisdom.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

wisdom.quote: If you are still living, there is no lose.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The dust on his face now turning to mild streaks of mud, where his tears fell, made him seem like an operatic clown character in Pagliacci when he looked at the inscription for the first time.To Alexander, my son, you are our brightest star. Always remember the only future you are ever guaranteed is the one you make for yourself. Willpower, Wisdom and intelligence are the keys—Love DadUpon reading the words in the ring Alex realized that when he lost in his mental battle. He had given into fate, in all its entropic nonsense. He let it dictate his world. He had surrendered in what he thought was a victory and left himself at the whimsical and incidental forces of chance.
wisdom.author: L.B. Ó Ceallaigh

wisdom.quote: One way to serve people is to let them blame you for their pain. The pain whose source is unknown is most unbearable. So people manufacture a source to reduce that pain.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: More you give care to others, more receptive you should be to receive care from others. Flow should be equal both ways. Unequal flow is a sign of emotional blockages and sickness.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: That is Andrema, the lyricist- the lover- he whose quill would pulse as he wrote and fill with a blush of blue, like a bruised nail. His verses, Fuschia, his verses open out like flowers of glass, and at their centre, between the brittle petals lies a pool of indigo, translucent and as huge as doom. His voice is unmuffled- it is like a bell, clearly ringing in the night of our confusions; but the clarity of imponderable depth- depth- so that his lines float on for evermore, Fuchsia- on and on, for evermore.
wisdom.author: Mervyn Peake

wisdom.quote: Thought is a tool for transformation.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Man is part of the mystery he seeks to solve.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Need is a necessity.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: A need is a necessity
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do not be afraid, my child," Sheba told her. "Fear is the prison of the mind.
wisdom.author: Dana Gricken

wisdom.quote: What we should fear the most is fearing what we shouldn’t.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: It is when the house has fallen and the precious collections of my life lay in scattered ruins all around me that I suddenly realize that I built a whole lot of house, but I forgot to build any kind of foundation.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Caution lies in every circumstance.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Experience is never an error.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Where there is no charity, there is no compassion.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Where there is no renewal of thoughts, there is no transformation.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Enlightenment is a sacred education.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends. John 15:13
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: El placer no está nunca en la claridad y en la prudencia, siempre en la embriagadez, en la superabundancia, en la ilusión; un brote de locura corresponde siempre a toda vida verdadera.
wisdom.author: Stefan Zweig

wisdom.quote: Relationship between two individuals can't have any problem. But individuals are rare to find. Most people have a whole crowd living in their head. Relationship between two crowds is bound to have problems.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Humanity origin from the same source.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The day you will is the day you won’t !!
wisdom.author: Hisham Fawzi

wisdom.quote: Nobody on their dying bed wished they had spent more time at the office or working but had time with the family and loved ones.
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: I will suggest that we do not only teach poor people how to fish but how to farm the fish—aquaculture!
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: As the native drum kept rhythm with the nighttime symphony of the African bush, the cry of a hyrax (a small, furry animal that sounded a lot scarier than it looked) pierced the night. A hyena howled. A warthog ran through our camp. What was he running from? Sitting in front of my tent, I tried to figure everything out. I wouldn’t have called what I did prayer but maybe wonder.  Night after night, I’d listened to the rush of a river or watched my own personal light show as lightning spider-webbed across the heavens, danced in the distance, and serenaded me with a muffled growl. Until a crash—so loud it seemed to break the sky—caused me to twitch as a shiver ran up my spine.  "You know how it is when you feel someone staring at you from across the room?" I said to Truth. "You turn to meet the gaze. It was like that, but I saw no one. I just felt a comforting presence as we sat together in silence."  "You think it was God?" she asked.  "Yeah, but I called him Fred. Not so overwhelming, more personal."
wisdom.author: Elizabeth Bristol

wisdom.quote: When we invented fire, we messed up repeatedly, then invented the fire extinguisher. With more powerful technologies such as nuclear weapons, synthetic biology and strong artificial intelligence, we should instead plan ahead and aim to get things right the first time, because it may be the only chance we will get. Our future is a race between the growing power of our technology and the wisdom with which we use it. Let’s make sure that wisdom wins.
wisdom.author: Stephen Hawking

wisdom.quote: The thought of deleting things permanently from life is painful. Moving them into recycle bin is easy. Take a break from things for 28 days and see if you want them back or not.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: By and large, it's better to be far and small.
wisdom.author: John Alejandro King a.k.a. The Covert Comic

wisdom.quote: ..read widely because almost nothing has been everywhere applied.
wisdom.author: Jesse Ball

wisdom.quote: wenn man beschließt, sich an einen Menschen zu binden, sagt man nicht: ›ich verspreche dir, dass ich mich nie mehr zu irgendjemand anderem hingezogen fühlen werde‹, man sagt: ›ich verspreche dir, dass meine loyalität dir gilt, obwohl ich möglicherweiße anderen menschen begegne, zu denen ich mich auch hingezogen fühlen werde. [...] Und das bedeutet, wenn du dann jemanden triffst, zu dem du dich hingezogen fühlst, liegt es an dir, dich der situation zu entziehen, bevor es zu schwer wird, gegen diese anziehung anzukämpfen (s. 297)
wisdom.author: Colleen Hoover

wisdom.quote: If it is not night, if there is no fog around, if there is no obstacle in front of you, endless horizon will appear! This is exactly what wisdom does: It turns the night in the mind into the day, disperses the mists, and completely removes all obstacles in front of your mind!
wisdom.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

wisdom.quote: She did not know why she had lied, but she was sure it was a wise decision.
wisdom.author: Steig Larsson

wisdom.quote: How queer old customs are, with their histories reaching so far back into the past," said Susan. "Our life isn’t all in the present, is it, Santa Claus? It is made up of thousands of bits of the past, old things that happened, old names, old habits. The past and the present and the future all belong to one another." "Of course," said Santa Claus. "And we ought to live in them all, not just thoughtlessly in the present. We ought to know our past, and we ought to plan for our future. Then the present would always be worth living in.
wisdom.author: Enid Blyton

wisdom.quote: Emotions are like vegetable and fruit juices. Some can be sipped while the others have to be swallowed with your nostrils shut.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: One of the criticisms I've faced over the years is that I'm not aggressive enough or assertive enough, or maybe somehow, because I'm empathetic, it means I'm weak. I totally rebel against that. I refuse to believe that you cannot be both compassionate and strong.
wisdom.author: Jacinda Ardern

wisdom.quote: Fools try to forget. The wise love.
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: In the life of every problem there is a point where it is big enough to see and small enough to deal with it easily.There is another point where the problem is too big to ignore and the available solutions are few and costly.Deal with problems as soon as you first see them..
wisdom.author: Stanley Gibson

wisdom.quote: You can't be to small to provide help nor too big to need help
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: My chief sin is doubt. I doubt everything and am in doubt nearly all the time.''Doubt is natural to human weakness,' repeated the priest.
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: « Car, à te dire vrai, Saint-Ange, l’une des plus grandes satisfactions que j’aie en ce monde, est de découvrir, soit par ma lecture, ou par un peu de jugement que Dieu m’a donné, la fausseté et l’absurdité de toutes ces opinions populaires qui entraînent de temps en temps les villes et les provinces entières en des abîmes de folie et d’extravagances. »
wisdom.author: Gabriel Naudé

wisdom.quote: If you keep a book too far or too close, you cannot read it properly .......... It has to be at an optimum distance!
wisdom.author: Sandeep Sahajpal

wisdom.quote: There are plenty of business opportunities around us, what we need is a creative entrepreneurial discernment to be able to discover, recognize and guts to seize them
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: Sink deep your roots and develop strong muscles before you start operating beyond borders.
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: Many beginner entrepreneurs become overly and unrealistic ambitious and want to operate beyond borders before taking time to learn the challenges and what it takes to expand overseas
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: Operate locally but do not close doors for cross border opportunities
wisdom.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

wisdom.quote: I've given you a power over me that you do not deserve.
wisdom.author: Jane Harper

wisdom.quote: Progress is nothing but the victory of laughter over dogma.
wisdom.author: Benjamin De Casseres

wisdom.quote: Having an opinion on something is not wisdom. Everybody has opinions. Seeing something in its entirety is called wisdom.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: This is indeed something that many highly sensitive people have difficulty navigating once they begin to be more in touch with their intuition. Being tapped into your intuitive wisdom is freeing, but not always easy.
wisdom.author: Julie Von

wisdom.quote: Whether you think you can, or you can't, you're right.
wisdom.author: H.E.  Browning

wisdom.quote: A person is judged by their word. If you don't have your word; if no one can TRUST your word, you have nothing.
wisdom.author: H.E.  Browning

wisdom.quote: Wealth is a person’s ability to survive a certain number of days forward.
wisdom.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

wisdom.quote: I feel a certain responsibility to heal my own things that carry with me, but also to share how I’ve taken trauma or difficult situations and made something beautiful. I feel like that’s what art is: to make something beautiful out of raw ideas, angst, or frustration. It’s your job to make the world a better place out of your mess on the floor.
wisdom.author: Joe Halstead

wisdom.quote: The surest sign of wisdom is constant cheerfulness- Count Rostov
wisdom.author: Amor Towles

wisdom.quote: The lamp must burn to give light.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Face your fate with faith.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Faith in new possibilities is the spirit of persistent pursuit.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Let your craziness be the courage to believe in new possibilities.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do not fear defeat nor death.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: While you live, do not forget that death will come a day which you do not know.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The dream is neccesary to define the destiny.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: To think that you don’t have a choice is actually a choice that’s an attempt to relieve you of the guilt of not making a choice.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Just because we choose to do nothing doesn’t mean that nothing will happen because we did nothing.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Live life as an explorer; what you find along the way is the essence of life - Tom Golway 2006
wisdom.author: Tom Golway

wisdom.quote: It takes only a flicker of the light of wisdom to dispel the vast darkness of ignorance. (p. 225)
wisdom.author: Miles Neale

wisdom.quote: A man is guided by his mission.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Warriors walks in a lonely wilderness.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Wisdom lies not in analyzing the obvious but rather in ignoring it.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: If you love me I will know by your actions not your words.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Leaders leads at their own risks. Therefore, they should be given all respect so that they can do their dutiful sacred work with gladness.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: We came to the world through different wombs. But the source is same creator.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Death is a final destiny.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Our steps from the start of life until the day of death is invisibly ordered by the Divine Being.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The day of death is only known by the Divine Being.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Thank God for the journey of a joyful lifetime.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Where do we come from, where do we go?;This is the miracle of birth, then the mystery of death.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The glory of the youth is their strength. In a country, where the youth are deprived of work, what a waste of valuable human resources.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Wisdom lies not in looking at the obvious but rather in searching for the not so obvious. The more tightly we focus, the wiser we become.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: In Buddhism, we talk about cultivating three types of wisdom; those arising through listening to teachings, contemplating their meaning and meditating on the ascertained meaning. These three types of wisdom have to arise sequentially in our mind stream. Through listening to teachings, we gain understanding; through contemplation, we deepen this understanding; through meditation, we apply the teachings to ourselves—in other words, we engage in the practice. We are very fortunate to have this wonderful human life and the opportunity to study and practice these teachings. We should make our best efforts, therefore, to follow the Dharma so that we will experience the benefits not only in this lifetime but also in many future lifetimes—and not just for ourselves but for other sentient beings as well.
wisdom.author: Dalai Lama XIV

wisdom.quote: Heroism lies in the hearts of humanity.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Let your principles be as firm as a rock as hard as a diamond.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: As soon as we understand the mystery of death, we will appreciate the miracle of our existence.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: If we understand the divinity of our existence, we will accept our diversity.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Who can understand how a child is formed in a womb of a woman? So we can never know the thoughts of God nor understand our existence or our departure.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: When you are trying to prove yourself to someone, you’ve already lost because you’re playing in a game set by them. This is a classic trick of Maya (Time-Space) to keep a soul trapped. She gives you an identity and asks you to prove it’s worth.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Pencil breaks when you sharpen it fully. A student who wants to write only after fully sharpening the pencil will never be able to write. He will waste whole pencil in sharpening.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: A young tree was bothered by the fact that a lot of tiny insects were living in its trunk. An old tree advised, "Focus on your larger self - roots, trunk, branches, leaves. The tiny insects will stop bothering you. Don’t let a woodpecker destroy you on the pretext of killing your insects.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: For worldly activities like swimming and paragliding, you need to put on additional special outfits. For spiritual pursuit, you need to remove your existing outfits (layers of ego).
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: When people need a reason to go, they turn the blame on you. When the rain of love turns into arrows of blame, throw away the umbrella and take up the shield.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Time and close attention will always reveal people’s true intentions.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: The tragedy is not failure but lack of faith.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Politics is a fair and good enough profession and a great vehicle that selfless people can really use to further humankind positively. Politics can not be a wrong thing, no. Just that wrong people are often found in such decent profession.
wisdom.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

wisdom.quote: The only danger is doubt.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Wrongdoing is worthless as weeds.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The winner walks alone.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The warrior never lose any battle, war is first won within.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Repentance is the only reality.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: If you have life, there is no loss.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: What you need to know, you can only experience.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Helping a person who does not want help or who is not ready to be helped. That person will see you as a problem.
wisdom.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

wisdom.quote: Value your well-being as the greatest wealth, without it, how can you work?
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The warrior knows the worth of the wilderness.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Faith in new possibilities is the only force of prayer.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is not to know much, but to know who knows... (1993)
wisdom.author: Paul J.M. Settels

wisdom.quote: When you become in tune (intuitive) with life, you can receive natural erudition (wisdom), and can perceive (recognize) that which enables you to write or chart your own future, in line with your own desires. There is so much going on in the world right now that is wrong. You can choose to do something about it, or do nothing.
wisdom.author: Ray Byfield

wisdom.quote: Life challenges us, so that we become enlightened. And by recognizing our true intrinsic nature—our transcendent potential—life becomes clarified in a manner that allows us to be an agent of change, not only for ourselves, but for many.
wisdom.author: Ray Byfield

wisdom.quote: Praying is a persuasive power.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: People keep searching until they find the obstacle. I keep searching to make sure there is no other obstacle.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: If you look at anything in this world with an impossible eye, nothing shall be possible for you.
wisdom.author: Samuel Clément

wisdom.quote: Friendship is the fruit of fellowship.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: There is nothing that educates a man better than his experience.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Without peace, how could the people make progress?
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Sometimes silence is a sign, not of not knowing what to say, but of knowing when to say what you know.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: Admitting that their child is, or can be, more educated than them is the closest most parents are willing to get to admitting that their child is, or can be, smarter or wiser than them.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: A creative mind remains in constant awareness and has a deeper connection with the Universe
wisdom.author: Debashis Dey

wisdom.quote: He was talking about respect. Safety. Protection. They were things no one owed you. And one way or another, you always paid
wisdom.author: Adrienne Young

wisdom.quote: When we focus too much on our problems, we forget to note our blessings. We must remember that what we keep thinking about grows and what we tend to ignore disappears.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: Entire wars have been based on our inability to see.
wisdom.author: Natalie Goldberg

wisdom.quote: The real you can create forever.
wisdom.author: Bert McCoy

wisdom.quote: Grab the momentFree yourself Express your feelings Connect with the universe
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: The real guru is always within, and while we may need an external guide to serve as a mirror to reflect our highest potential, we should never abandon our innate common sense, intuition, emotions, and wisdom. (p. 163)
wisdom.author: Miles Neale

wisdom.quote: Man must treasure his trials as treasury of hidden truth.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: It rest in you to live responsibly.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: It rest on you to live responsibly.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Your life is your responsibility.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Persistent perseverance is the only patience there is.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The necessity of tomorrow is the need for today.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Methodically messaging in a harmony of honor, humility, authenticity and authority may create more resonation for your story to be heard by that many more connections.
wisdom.author: Loren Weisman

wisdom.quote: A man needs his trials to learn the truth of his existence.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Stillness is a privilege.
wisdom.author: Bert McCoy

wisdom.quote: Trust wisdom, the harder you work the better luck you have.
wisdom.author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1989

wisdom.quote: Where there is no peace, there is no true prosperity for peace opens door for true prosperity.
wisdom.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

wisdom.quote: A huge part of culture is the painting of a particular degree or kind of foolishness as wisdom, by at least the vast majority of a particular group of fools … or mostly fools.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: Every man must choose his own course.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Everything passes, but everything remains. This is a cherished thought for me, that nothing goes away for ever, nothing is lost, but somehow, somewhere, stays. Its worth remains, although we cease to perceive it. And our labors, even if everyone forgot about them, remain and somehow give their fruits. And for this reason, although I regret the past, there is a living sense of its eternity. I did not part with them eternally, but only in time. And it seems to me that all people, whatever they might think, feel the same in the depth of their souls. Without this, life would become senseless and empty.
wisdom.author: Pavel Florensky

wisdom.quote: The value of the Dwelling lies in the Dweller.
wisdom.author: Idries Shah

wisdom.quote: Now is not the time to think of what we do not have and what we cannot do. Now is the time to think of what we can do with what we have.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: Wisdom lies in knowing what you are not, confidence lies in knowing what you are.
wisdom.author: Mark Anthony Tierno

wisdom.quote: May we find place in our hearts to forgive each other's faults.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Well, didn't you look sharp with your boots when you met me on the path?From two-tone to downtown Beirut but only halfway backStealing bits of wisdom from the shelfTurned prisons into prisms of the selfAnd what do they know about the springtime or me and you?Born in the midst of the long hot summer we lived throughDid they see you run for every rhyme?Did we run for running out of time?When even heroes have to dieNo one lives forever, love, no one's wise to tryWe're adding our own wisdom to the shelfStealing bits of paper, we had helpBut working away, did we miss the passing of the time?In your own flame you can wither though your passions still outshineDid you read the writing on the wall?Prophesying doom upon us allBut even heroes have to dieNo one lives forever, love, no one's wise to tryBut hidden in the writing on the wallMany are the beauties of the fall
wisdom.author: Ted Leo

wisdom.quote: Pain told in our small time becomes a windswept seed to providently tend, and less a thistle snared deep between each breath.
wisdom.author: Ian William L.

wisdom.quote: Do not be blinded by brokenness nor bitterness.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The tragedy of life is never troubles. But lack of desires to seek the hidden treasures of time.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The sweetest thing on earth is to be saved.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: One of the most dangerous traps for the believer is a good thing that's not a God thing.
wisdom.author: Andrena Sawyer

wisdom.quote: Our steps are invisible ordered by the Divine Being from the day of birth to the day of death.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: We both found much more truth in poems than in the rhetoric of those who write to flirt with the power of their time, or those who only speak the 'truth' once the word 'former' becomes attached to their job titles. We both believed that powerful writing is a combination of madness and reason, observation and courage.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: I often struggle with every word I try to put on paper: there is always a voice within me screaming, ‘It is all useless! The world has gone totally deaf and blind!’But then another voice comes: ‘Sitting in a dark corner and closing your door and windows is also useless!’ And so, until the world decides to open its ears and its eyes, do I have any choice but to bleed on the endless snows of my blank pages?
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: Of learned Fools I have seen ten times ten,Of unlearned wise men I have seen a hundred.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: The Use of Money is all the Advantage there is in having Money.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: On my right side there was a young couple making out in public. On my left side an old woman was staring at the young couple maliciously, either wishing she was part of it, or mocking the whole ‘lovemaking’ scene as a grand project of separation.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: They will not even dare take a minute and stand in front of a mirror to examine their faces lest they suddenly realize how defeated, how duped they have been all these years. There is something about staring at ourselves in the mirror that makes us question our very existence, and whether we are the kind of people that we wanted to be, a question that so many people avoid confronting.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: Revolution is resolve to do what is right.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Friendship never fades.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Life is enduring labour.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do no violence to foreigners nor the fatherless.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do no wrong to the widows.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Teachers are the building blocks to the doors of success
wisdom.author: Angel M.B. Chadwick

wisdom.quote: The poor have little, beggars none, the rich too much, enough not one.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: As our knowledge increases, so does our desire to maintain silence and hide from the world whose face is washed every morning with the blood of countless innocent people.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: As soon as we understand death we shall begin to live with a sense of duty.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: A man's trials are his hidden treasures.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Time tests all men.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Having the right attitude is the beginning to all wisdom.
wisdom.author: Steven Canyon

wisdom.quote: If we courageously and truthfully start inquiry into the belief data of our mind, we come to understand that not even one belief is completely true about ourselves or about anyone outside us. When we understand this, the world then becomes a kinder place. We come to understand that we were at war with the ways of the world, and we believed that the world was a crazy place. Yet the truth becomes clear that the world was not crazy; we became crazy by holding on to our beliefs about the world.
wisdom.author: Premlatha Rajkumar

wisdom.quote: We gather wisdom through every experience in this body, we expand our consciousness, and we continuously recreate ourselves.
wisdom.author: Premlatha Rajkumar

wisdom.quote: It is not greed that drives the but envy.
wisdom.author: Warren Buffett

wisdom.quote: You have to find you way in this world.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: If you believe in God, from your inner most being, shall flow rivers of living water.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: It may not be an easy time to get what we want but it’s the right time to appreciate what we have.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: The origin of life is the same for all living beings.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Be kind to others, especially when they are not kind to you.
wisdom.author: Frank Kayihura

wisdom.quote: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the alternation of the night and the day, and the [great] ships which sail through the sea with that which benefits people, and what Allah has sent down from the heavens of rain, giving life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and dispersing therein every [kind of] moving creature, and [His] directing of the winds and the clouds controlled between the heaven and earth are signs for a people who use reason.
wisdom.author: (Quran 2:164

wisdom.quote: While we don’t have power over the events in our lives, in recovery we do have power over the way we respond to them.
wisdom.author: John Bruna

wisdom.quote: 99.99% of fools deny their foolishness. The rest underestimate it.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: Society gives you some goals. You achieve them after much effort. You celebrate for a few days. Then life becomes the same as before. You don't get the happiness you were expecting. Achievements feel useless. Then you attach your pride to them to make them seem useful. Pride is a tool of self deception.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: What are mere pearls when you’ll become the ocean,And that bright sun with its revolving motion!
wisdom.author: Rumi

wisdom.quote: A life of surrender, giving up control, was the simplest solution to living a peaceful life.
wisdom.author: Aarti Raheja

wisdom.quote: Any fool can find answers. People who ask new questions, they are the geniuses
wisdom.author: John LLoyd

wisdom.quote: Waste no time to argue what a manner of man you are.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: It is senseless to stumble in sin. Give up your sins.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do not insist on going the same way when the road is block, take another turn.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: What matter most is we have being give life, thereof, we must live well to the best of our abilities.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Without many wants, there is no waste.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: This was a tall order, and one could criticize it on the grounds that it was somewhat circular: how can you justify your methods of reasoning on the basis of those same methods of reasoning? It is like lifting yourself up by your own bootstraps.
wisdom.author: Douglas R. Hofstadter

wisdom.quote: The fact that life throws anything at you is a great way to knowing you can become anything.
wisdom.author: Samuel Clément

wisdom.quote: There is no hindrances in matters of the heart.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: If you see a danger ahead, withdraw from the battle field.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: If you are OK being dishonest, circumstances will squeeze you so much that you will have no other option but to be dishonest. If you are not OK being dishonest, circumstances will allow you to stay honest.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Reality is better than riddles.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Discouragement is disease.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Discouragement is a disease.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Fantasy and daydreams are like internet. They enrich your life but if you're using them as an escape from painful 'reality', they can suck you into a dark spiral path.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Without renewal of thought, how can there be transformation?
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: It is tragic that the best healers attract the unhealable patients.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Don't judge your past actions in the present context.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: (Sorrow in the Heart of an Apple)I clean up my old sorrowWrapped it in a clean and scented piece of cloth Buried it under an apple treein our apple orchard in the village.Seasons passed…It seemed to me that everything was overWhen the harvest season came again.I forgot that I had wanted to forget about my sorrowI forgot where I had buried it, too.I picked an attractive red appleThat looked glorious and delicious.From the first bite,I immediately recognizedThe taste of that same age-old sorrow.I realized then that my buried sorrowHad multiplied.And here I amFace to face with it again:Here I am finding itIn the heart of every single apple!
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: Fruits ripen with a little warmth, not fire, A furnace’s heat fruit does not require....
wisdom.author: Rumi

wisdom.quote: The winner walks alone in the wilderness.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: While eyes are shut the pain will not subside,They yearn to join with light that is outside;It’s due to your eyes’ light’s attracting pull,Which seeks light rays as soon as possible.If your eyes feel some pain while open, thenWhen blocked of transient light, pain fills your eyes,So you should open them, if you are wise...
wisdom.author: Jawid Mojaddedi

wisdom.quote: Uncorrected errors evolve into terror
wisdom.author: Constance Friday

wisdom.quote: Be not whom you're not.
wisdom.author: Constance Friday

wisdom.quote: The answers to the biggest questions of life that are unavailable in your past or in your present are available in your future
wisdom.author: Constance Friday

wisdom.quote: In The Ethics of Our Fathers, a book of the Talmud, Rabbi Tarfon says: "You are not obligated to complete the work, but neither are you free to abandon it." By the end, this is how I came to feel about my work. Dismantling the rise of fascism is best not left to lone vigilantes, nor to the punitive mechanisms of the state, but to people working together to stamp out hate wherever it arises. In the meantime, I cook like a Jew: paprika, dill, onions, garlic, warm broth, and company. The herring is optional, but love is not optional. It is what we must marshal to break the back of the beast. To do so, we must break bread together: a prickle of salt, a pat of melting butter, a bite, a kiss, a homily in the mouth about what's worth fighting for.
wisdom.author: Talia Lavin

wisdom.quote: There are certain points I do not yet understand:They will be clear later. I am also convincedThat you only hold a fragment of the explanation.It is only because of what you do not understandThat you feel the need to declare what you do.There is more to understand: hold fast to thatAs the way to freedom.
wisdom.author: T.S. Eliot

wisdom.quote: Lovely days don’t come to you, you should walk to them.
wisdom.author: Rumi

wisdom.quote: Should you, my sweet readers, ever face these terrible times- and a lot of you will- just know the days do get better. I promise. You are not alone.
wisdom.author: Kate O'Hearn

wisdom.quote: It does no harm to the romance of the sunset to know a little about it.
wisdom.author: Carl Sagan

wisdom.quote: I say, "Sky is blue." Someone who lives in a polluted place says, "Sky is grey". I will have to agree with him because sky can be grey too if it gets covered by smoke. But he won't agree with me because he has never seen a blue sky. The one who knows more has to agree with the one who knows less.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: What is being late other than the time-table that I have assigned to something because I’m not certain God’s got a watch that’s in synch with mine.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: Do not fight for peace, fight for justice instead, then you will automatically have peace.
wisdom.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

wisdom.quote: With time, you age, and you become wise.Though no one is sure about the second one..!
wisdom.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

wisdom.quote: The best thing to do with a good advice is to pass it on.
wisdom.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

wisdom.quote: Choosing your fight is most important. Many of the fights we encounter hardly worth a fight and probably our energy.
wisdom.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

wisdom.quote: Sometimes it is not necessary to tell everything you know just because the people around doesn't want somebody who knows more than them..!
wisdom.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

wisdom.quote: Perception is all about incomplete knowledge.It may turn positive if wisdom overpowers knowledge, and it may turn negative if incompleteness overshadows wisdom.
wisdom.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

wisdom.quote: The things you accumulate daily tends to make you lose yourself a bit daily.Everything asks the time, start assembling yourself.
wisdom.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

wisdom.quote: To find what you're looking for in a cluttered room, you may have to organize the whole room. You may have to give time to the things that you're not looking for. No effort goes waste. Everything is connected.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: No matter how far you go in pursuit of peace, without justice, it will always be in vain.
wisdom.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

wisdom.quote: Real treasure is not about what we want. Rather, it’s about what we need. And until we get those in the right order, we will continue to use treasure to create trash heaps.
wisdom.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

wisdom.quote: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.
wisdom.author: Deepak Chopra

wisdom.quote: The fire must not go out. The flame must be lit.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Taking care of yourself is commendable; taking care of others is noble.
wisdom.author: LZ

wisdom.quote: Pride, What a mischief. Shame, What a waste. Arrogance, What audacity. Humility, Where's the taste.
wisdom.author: LZ

wisdom.quote: Moral wisdom delivers a man from wrongdoing.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: I never knew how to haveI've learned to live without loveAnd I can't change all of a suddenSomething's got to happen
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: Life is love;Love is life;And there's a love like a lifeAnd a life like a love
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: In those early daysI feltYour feelings:My memoryIs filledWith your loveAnd now that you resemble meI see in your glanceThe reflectionOf who I can love
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I know there’s a realityI never understoodAs I wander in UtopiaBut I find a courage In your auraI know there’s a worldBetter than thisBoth for you and meAnd I’ll show itBecause I believe in miracles
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: In an Earth of warIn a world of deceptionIn an era of liesI fell in love with youAnd I was healed
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: All the strength that I needI see it in youAnd because I love youI find strength in me
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I prefer the darkAnd often I cryBut is it so sad?You prefer the lightAnd you smileBut are you happy?Our eyes seeDifferent thingsBut our thoughtsAre alignedAnd I’m wonderingWhy I love youWhen we can’t liveThe same life
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: You're a ghost for meAnd you're miles awayBut somehowI feel your presenceHere with me
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: What a time to be in loveWith a distant soulBut your spirit was always hereWhen mine was lostNow I see what I couldn’t
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: There is no milk at home - You bring the milk.House is dirty - You clean it.You are missing a friend- You call them. You have a question . You get answer.You feel emptiness inside you - You listen to a spiritual Guru.Do you see these circles getting completed? Find the paper on which these circles are drawn.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: When your mind fills with dark clouds of bad temper and the lightening of anger is about to strike, look for the shelter. Don’t run outside towards the target of your anger. The only shelter is inside you where your deity is smiling, where your higher self is shining.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Some of our problems came to us; some, we went to them.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: Once you name something, it stops you seeing the whole of it, or why it matters. You focus on the word, which is just the tiniest part, really, the tip of an iceberg. I’ve never been that comfortable with words—I always think in pictures, express myself with images.- Alicia Berenson’s Diary
wisdom.author: Alex Michaelides

wisdom.quote: Doubt leads to destruction.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: A wise man waits until everyone else has spoken.
wisdom.author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1980

wisdom.quote: Youth is pert and positive, Age modest and doubting: So Ears of Corn when young and light, stand bolt upright, but hang their Heads when weighty, full, and ripe.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: Set forth to them the similitude of the life of this world: It is like the rain which we send down from the skies: the earth's vegetation absorbs it, but soon it becomes dry stubble, which the winds do scatter: it is (only) Allah who prevails over all things.
wisdom.author: Quran 18:45

wisdom.quote: The limitations of man's perception might seem to lead to despair. But the very fact that God has an overarching plan that embraces every human experience points in the opposite direction. You, your daily moment-by-moment circumstances, your final end are all "from the hand of God" (Eccl. 2:24). In this confidence you may deal with the vanity, the frustrations, the transitoriness of daily life.
wisdom.author: O. Palmer Robertson

wisdom.quote: The root of evil is envy.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The measure of brilliance is in its utility.
wisdom.author: Rich DiSilvio

wisdom.quote: Fact is never faith.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The circumstance causes a change.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Without hope, the heart hardens.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Focusing on the past is history;Focusing on the present is experience;Focusing on the future is hope.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: Sometimes when you are in the lowest part of your life, you gain the greatest wisdom.
wisdom.author: Christine Willson

wisdom.quote: Sometimes you find yourself so grateful that a prayer of yours was not answered that you pray that it be ignored. Just in case it is on the waiting list of prayers to be answered.
wisdom.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

wisdom.quote: Many people cross our paths either by choice or through Kinship. Those who are not meant to be part of our lives will leave but those who add value to our lives will remain.
wisdom.author: Nadine Sadaka Boulos

wisdom.quote: What has become of the Golden Rule? It exists, it continues to sparkle, and is well taken care of. It is Exhibit A in the Church’s assets, and we pull it out every Sunday and give it an airing...It is strictly religious furniture, like an acolyte, or a contribution-plate, or any of those things. It is never intruded into business."Mark Twain"Noah and a few like him perceived that the continent was indeed finite, and that venal office-holders, legislators in particular, could be persuaded to toss great hunks of it up for grabs, and to toss them in such a way as to have them land where Noah and his kind were standing."Thus did a handful of rapacious citizens come to control all that was worth controlling in America. Thus was the savage and stupid and entirely inappropriate and unnecessary and humorless American class system created. Honest, industrious, peaceful citizens were classed as bloodsuckers if they asked to be paid a living wage. And they saw that praise was reserved henceforth for those who devised ways of getting paid enormously for committing crimes against which no law had been passed. Thus the American dream turned belly up, turned green, bobbed to the scummy surface of cupidity unlimited, filled with gas, and went bang in the noonday sun."Kurt Vonnegut Jr. from God Bless You Mr. Rosewater
wisdom.author: Twain Vonnegut

wisdom.quote: The blood of our forefathers where shed in the building of this nation.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: If you stop writing, you forget the words you know.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: There is no wondering like writing.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: They don’t want people who are smart enough to sit around the kitchen table and figure out how badly they’re getting fucked by a system that threw them overboard thirty years ago. They want people who are just smart enough to run the machines and do the paperwork, and just dumb enough to passively accept all the increasingly shitty jobs with the less pay, reduced benefits, the end of overtime—and the vanishing pension that disappears the minute you come to collect it. And now they’re coming for your Social Security. They want your retirement money. They want it back so they can give it to their criminal Wall Street friends. And you know what? They’ll get it! They’ll get it all. They count on the fact that Americans will remain willfully ignorant."The prophetic Mr. George Carlin"It’s just a ride. We can change it any time we want. It’s just a choice. No effort, no work, no job, no savings of money—a choice, right now, between fear and love. The eyes of fear want you to put bigger locks on your door, buy guns, close yourself off. The eyes of love instead see all of us as one. Here’s what we can do to make this world a better ride. Take all the money we spend on weapons every year and use it to feed and clothe the poor of the world. There will be enough to help every person in the world, not one left out—and we can explore space, both inner and outer, together, in peace."Bill Hicks"Try to learn to breathe deeply, really taste food when you eat, and when you sleep to really sleep. Try as much as possible to be wholly alive with all your might, and when you laugh, laugh like hell. And when you get angry, get good and angry. Try to be alive. You will be dead soon enough."William Saroyan
wisdom.author: Carlin Hicks Saroyan

wisdom.quote: Everything is in excess except money, thereof, it should be well managed.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Our existence on earth is for its enjoyment.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Our existence on earth is for our enjoyment.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: We often forget that the cure is hidden within the illness itself... Sometimes it is not even hidden for those who can see.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: Change comes when converted.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Without communities, there is no country.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: The only leisure of life is labour.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Snow falls on a quiet street and then night falls, the street becomes ice cold! Find a street like this and drink that awesome silence there! Anyone who opens the doors of his mind to silence will witness that the door of silence in turn opens to wisdom!
wisdom.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

wisdom.quote: The past exists to make us appreciative, aware, and wise. It is a lesson, nothing more.
wisdom.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

wisdom.quote: Oh, my friends, the first wish I have for the new year is to change the worn-out greeting: 'happy new year'. There is no happiness, only fleeting moments of joy. There is nothing new under the sun, only new ways of looking at the same eternal challenges and unresolved questions. There is no point in wishing for a perfect health in a profoundly sick world – the view is much clearer and more interesting when living on the edge. And so, I wish you all endurance as we go through another difficult year. I wish you courage to snatch a few more days (or moments) of joy as another year slips through the fingers of Time. I wish you much strength to maintain your equilibrium as we face new earthquakes of uncertainty in the coming year. Most of all, I wish we never give up on the possibility of doing things otherwise. And, of course, I wish you much love.
wisdom.author: Louis Yako

wisdom.quote: In the casual opinion of most Americans, I am an old man, and therefore of little account, past my best, fading in a pathetic diminuendo while flashing his AARP card; like the old in America generally, either invisible or someone to ignore rather than respect, who will be gone soon, and forgotten, a gringo in his degringolade.Naturally I am insulted by this, but out of pride I don’t let my indignation show. My work is my reply, my travel is my defiance. And I think of myself in the Mexican way, not as an old man but as most Mexicans regard a senior, an hombre de juicio, a man of judgement; not ruco, worn out, beneath notice, someone to be patronized, but owed the respect traditionally accorded to an elder, someone (in the Mexican euphemism) of La Tercera Edad, the Third Age, who might be called Don Pablo or tio (uncle) in deference. Mexican youths are required by custom to surrender their seat to anyone older. They know the saying: Mas sabe el diablo por viejo, que por diablo - The devil is wise because he’s old, not because he’s the devil. But "Stand aside, old man, and make way for the young" is the American way. As an Ancient Mariner of a sort, I want to hold the doubters with my skinny hand, fix them with a glittering eye, and say, "I have been to a place where none of you have ever been, where none of you can ever go. It is the past. I spent decades there and I can say, you don’t have the slightest idea.
wisdom.author: Paul Theroux

wisdom.quote: Just remember: when you lose, don't lose the lesson.
wisdom.author: Miles Watson

wisdom.quote: Nothing is stopping you except the names and identities that you've given to yourself. If you identify yourself as a scientist, you can't go outside the boundary of science. Philosopher can't go beyond the boundary of philosophy and a spiritualist can't go beyond the boundary of spirituality.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Most people in this world, John, are assholes.
wisdom.author: Ron Swanson

wisdom.quote: We won't attain maturity unless we cultivate the wisdom to discriminate which deeds of our ancestors we need to reject and which achievements we need to take inspiration from.
wisdom.author: S.L. Bhyrappa

wisdom.quote: Disappointment is never a defeat.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Maya (Space-Time) takes away more than it gives. The neighbour whose lifestyle you envy has bigger problems than yours.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Before you learn to make perfect dough, you will add excess water a few times. To find the sweet spot of anything, you shouldn't be afraid of doing it in excess.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: ...جایی که برادر به برادر نکند رحم.بیگانه برای تو برادر شدنی نیست.Do not be flattered when your enemy shows you love,the smile of an executioner is not sweet talk.... In a place where brother has no mercy on brother, a stranger can never become your brother.
wisdom.author: Rumi

wisdom.quote: A probability distribution governing the evolution of a stochastic process has infinitely many Bayesian representations of the form
wisdom.author: Matthew O Jackson Ehud Khalai Rann Smorodinsky

wisdom.quote: A probability distribution governing the evolution of a stochastic process has infinitely many Bayesian representations of the form
wisdom.author: Ehud Khalai

wisdom.quote: The battles you choose not to fight are every bit as important as the ones you do.
wisdom.author: Sope Agbelusi

wisdom.quote: What is heroic is not making life any harder than it has to be.
wisdom.author: Marty Rubin

wisdom.quote: Don't fight with the barriers surrounding you. Their strength lies in how much attention you give to them. Shift the attention on yourself. Start loving yourself and they will disperse and make way for what is truly yours.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Do no wrong to a widow nor a widower.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: If the gospel is preach, the perishing will not perish, the dying will not die.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do not forsake the fatherless.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do not forsake a friend of your father.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do no wicked to the weak.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Do not mislead a blind man.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: I said warfare and wisdom," Athena explained. "I'll oversee the kind of combat that requires planning, craftiness, and high intelligence. You can still be in charge of the stupid, bloody, 'manly man' aspects of war."Oh, all right," said Ares. Then he frowned. "Wait...what?
wisdom.author: Rick Riordan

wisdom.quote: Good morning! Let's choose to have a good day today.
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Learning never stops. Keep striving for that next level!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Just because someone doesn't see your value doesn't mean that your value isn't there.
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: I want to encourage, uplift and support you!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: I myself have noticed that when we worry about what people think, we hold ourselves back from doing amazing things.
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Don't worry about what people think of you because that can create an anchor in your life.
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Introspect unto soulful nakedness.
wisdom.author: Aditya Shukla

wisdom.quote: This world is no paradise;People try to disguise;People care about liesAnd love is dyingThis world wasn’t meant to unite;It’s all a constructionFor every kingdom’s strategy;There is no place for love
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: We riseAnd we fall;We fallAnd we rise;In a timeThat riseIs the new fallAnd fallIs the new rise
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I won’t denyA part of meJust because someMight not like itFor me it isn’t wrong:It helped me evolveAnd be the personI grew to be
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I am free from loveAnd I’m better off aloneWithout a motivationTo realize a bond
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: Love took me to hateI gave my heartI gave my soulBut it was not enoughLove took me to hateAnd I’m gratefulBecause now I knowWhere is hateAnd where is love
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: You’re not kind with meI don’t want what you do:Telling lies With disguiseBecause of an ideaYou have for me?
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: Once I was full of feelingsBut back then I was innocent;Now I can’t fall in love:Is it meOr the world?
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I’m no sinner;I’m closer to a saintI would sayBecause I beat my passionsWhile others couldn’t
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: Now it seemsAs thoughIt’s no timeFor loveBut the timeFor the trUth!
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: Words turn to anagrams;Temples get burnt;Songs contain threats;What is happening in the world?World War III is in the air;Have we realized it yet?Madonna came to pray;Have we woken up?
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: The day of apocalypse came;Everyone knows the truth now;Everyone sees now;Except of the ignorants of technology;Humanity screams changeFor a fairer tomorrow
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: When I close my eyesI see the light:A Universe within my spark;When I open my eyesI see the dark:A Universe out of sight
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: They are all criminalsBut can you catch them?They catch their victims instead;Innocents are weakAnd moral
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: Hate roseAnd any hopeBecame blue;How to reverse the lies?How to love againIn the fake sunset?
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: This roseIs me:The future heartI always had
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I can’t live anymoreIn this world;No one is fairNo one truly caresAnd I can’t find my love
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: I still liveAnd I feelThat I will never dieAll my lifeAn infinite timeBoth an eternityAnd a prisonBut perhaps these two are one
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: If you don’t give meMy dreamsI will be negative -If you give meMy dreamsI will be positive +
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: Doubt is a disease.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Experience is no error.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: We have become a generation of using big English words to box, manipulate, degrade, dehumanize and to abuse other people. Especially if those people are not doing what we like or what we want them to do.
wisdom.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

wisdom.quote: Love is greatBut when you love someoneWho is a ghost for youAnd you're a ghost for themIt's seemingly unfortunate:The love is hollowThe qualmsAre a burdenBut the qualitiesKeeps you goingAnd the secret languageFills you with sacred energy
wisdom.author: Jazalyn

wisdom.quote: All art is either great - or someone else's fantasy.
wisdom.author: D.A. Holdsworth

wisdom.quote: The wisest are seldom appreciated in their time.
wisdom.author: Samantha Shannon

wisdom.quote: Every thought has form and you can look at it objectively. When you become aware of your thoughts, you can choose not to react to them. When you are unaware of your thoughts, you tend to react unconsciously to everything that passes through your mind.
wisdom.author: Ashraf Karayath

wisdom.quote: True grown-ups are thoroughly childlike.
wisdom.author: D.A. Holdsworth

wisdom.quote: Not everyone can achieve intelligence. But everyone can achieve wisdom, some just choose not to.
wisdom.author: Colbey Miskech

wisdom.quote: Never fear adversity. Every setback, struggle and storm will add to your focus, strength and wisdom.
wisdom.author: Alex G Zarate

wisdom.quote: Wanting to be in politics but not of it.
wisdom.author: Barack Obama

wisdom.quote: When people stop being the way they were, your mind starts increasing the spices to compensate for the loss of ingredients. Our eyes open only when it’s too late... when ingredients completely disappear and our own spices is all that is left.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: The knowledge that the world has given you is nothing but a set of robotic commands. It has turned you into robot: What is it? Milk. What to do with it? Bring it from the shop, boil it and drink.What is it? Tree. What to do with it? Just ignore it. It is there to keep your oxygen levels normal.And so on. It has made you into robot. It has given you an illusion of freewill and choice.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Whether you are on a spiritual quest or worldly quest, beware of the glass windows i.e. the people and paths that keep you caged forever by constantly feeding you hope of freedom.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Whatever happened in the past brought you to this point in life. If you are sad at this point, you will say, "It happened for bad." If you are happy at this point, you will say, "It happened for good.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Learn from waste disposal system of your body. Wasteful people or situations pass through the most sensitive aspect of your life just before they exit forever. Don’t be scared; don’t make a deal with the devil when he is heading towards the exit door.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: A child who has just learned alphabets can’t enjoy the story until she learns the meaning of the words.Life is a story. You can read it through worldly knowledge but you can’t enjoy it until you get the spiritual knowledge.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Looking from a distance, we find something attractive and excitedly commit to it. When we come near, we find it unbearable. Then we have to continue with it because we have already committed to it.Everything in Maya (Time-Space) is like that. You current status in life is something your younger self would find very attractive. It looked exciting from the distance of Time. Now it’s not.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Little spice and chillies don’t do any harm. They rather make your dish tastier. When you feel angry or irritated for short term, just think that life is adding some spice and chillies in the dish it’s cooking for you.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: love is a broken boomerang
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: If beautiful flowers were edible, you would eat them stale because you would use fresh flowers for decoration and display. Life is like a rare beautiful flower which is edible. We spend most of it in displaying to others.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: your tongue touches meand a sharpened knife twists my insides sideways
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: Dustbin, chair, bathroom, bedroom... all kind of dirty and clean things can fit perfectly well in the house. Similarly, all kind of people can fit perfectly in life if you just define your boundaries and set your priorities right.Don’t sit near dustbin, don’t keep garbage on chair, don’t bath in bedroom and don’t sleep in bathroom.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: born into this black universe a rare phenomenonhere you are, what have you seen?is this all that life can be?
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: two spears have glided,  and our souls collided in mine, you confided and my blackened mind  was enlightened
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: take me to your mountain, and let us fly past the sky
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: we aren't even real and neither are the drugs so before this world ends lets go have some fun
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: youth in love, even when your ears ring,tie your shoes under the moonbefore the sun can touch the strings.
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: in here/ everyone must be / something other than human
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: The monkeys sit on soft rocks Until a scream is released from their clocks They stare into an abyssPost photos of a lunar eclipseSoul-filling moments Consistently missed
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: the human in me doesn’t belong to this society
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: role models are only role modelswhen they’re not your friend.
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: his eyes stare at her lipslike they're the only source of water
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: the sides of the road turned into wet paint.the colors were no longer so faint. his words a brushand we were in no rush.
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: i hope this street carries us for miles.
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: i forgot, as did my earth motherto teach my hands how to hold another
wisdom.author: Kelsey Webb

wisdom.quote: Science fiction of today, may become science fact of tomorrow
wisdom.author: G. M.

wisdom.quote: Knowledge has the power to destroy fear.
wisdom.author: Alexander James Guckenberger

wisdom.quote: Education occurs in the mind of the willing.
wisdom.author: Alexander James Guckenberger

wisdom.quote: There is no flames of fire like Faith.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: People are purified in pain.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: We have come as far as we have because we are the cleverest creatures to have ever lived on Earth. But if we are to continue to exist, we will require more than intelligence. We will require wisdom.
wisdom.author: David Attenborough

wisdom.quote: Anyone can buy a flower, but it takes more to grow one and let its beauty live on.
wisdom.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

wisdom.quote: Maybe death is a way to clean the self, of the body,to finally celebrate it. A celebration should leave a mess.
wisdom.author: Natalie Díaz

wisdom.quote: Wisdom carries the burden within, knowledge is more procurable
wisdom.author: Kumar Pranay

wisdom.quote: Those who think a lot don't talk much. Those who talk a lot don't think much.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: Life is easy but life is not easy. Which message is for the mind and which one for the heart. That is the ultimate question
wisdom.author: The Suited Monk

wisdom.quote: A genius is someone who allows us to see things and realise. Something we didn't realise before. Children are geniuses. We were all children once
wisdom.author: The Suited Monk

wisdom.quote: Sin, but sin lawfully.
wisdom.author: The Suited Monk

wisdom.quote: Don't doubt, just believe!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: What is the meaning of life, is the same answer to the question, what is the meaning of leadership.
wisdom.author: Raf Adams - The Suited Monk

wisdom.quote: We have so much knowledge, but so little understanding.
wisdom.author: Raf Adams The Suited Monk: Finding Your Life's Purpose and True Happiness

wisdom.quote: Sometimes there is so much external noise going around that we lose ourselves in the process.
wisdom.author: Raf Adams

wisdom.quote: Doar ca astazi nu cred ca sentimentele nobile si chestiile de felul asta sunt lucrul cel mai important in viata. Cu siguranta ca nu. Sentimentele sunt doar un foc pe o miriste: arde o clipa, si apoi nu ramane altceva decat funingine si cenusa. Stii care e lucrul principal - lucrul pe care o femeie ar trebui sa-l caute la barbatul ei? Ar trebui sa caute o calitate care nu e deloc excitanta, dar e mai rara decat aurul: buna-cuviinta. Si poate si bunatatea. Astazi, e bine sa afli asta, eu pun buna-cuviinta mai presus de bunatate. Buna-cuviinta e painea, bunatatea e untul. Sau mierea.
wisdom.author: Amos Oz

wisdom.quote: Listen to your intuition and trust your gut instinct.
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Your grandmother was not teaching me how to behave in class. She was teaching me how to ruthlessly interrogate the subject that elicited the most sympathy and rationalizing--myself.
wisdom.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

wisdom.quote: When God is silence, be still.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Heaven is in your heart.
wisdom.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wisdom.quote: Focus on the parts of yourself that will not diminish with time – humour and wisdom are not like collagen. You will make more of them as you age.
wisdom.author: Eleanor Gordon-Smith

wisdom.quote: Whether you disappoint someone or make them happy, in both cases you engage and occupy their mind. In both cases you give them what their mind craves for : any form of engagement.
wisdom.author: Shunya

wisdom.quote: There are many things that I hope readers take away from this book. This is one of the most important: if you are drowsy while driving, please, please stop. It is lethal. To carry the burden of another’s death on your shoulders is a terrible thing.
wisdom.author: Matthew Walker

wisdom.quote: The sky is not the limit! Reach higher!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Watch the blade, not the soldier, Madoc told me many times. Steel never deceives.
wisdom.author: Holly Black

wisdom.quote: Expand my sisters and brothers - expand your hearts – expand your minds - expand your horizons beyond the wildest imaginations of your traditions - and the whole world will become your home.
wisdom.author: Abhijit Naskar

wisdom.quote: Reject fear, have faith, receive your blessings!
wisdom.author: Anneka Jordan

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is discovering peace and happiness in any situation or setting.
wisdom.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

wisdom.quote: A person should never expel their energies in unnecessary ways.
wisdom.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

wisdom.quote: Listening to the warnings our instincts send out helps a person to know when to advertise all of their secrets, and when to whisper them quietly in the back of the mind.
wisdom.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

wisdom.quote: Having the freedom to think and explore ideas undistracted breeds a love of knowledge and understanding.
wisdom.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

wisdom.quote: Those who seek out the comfort of trees are usually on a journey for meaning, wisdom.
wisdom.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

wisdom.quote: Perfecting patience takes a lifetime.
wisdom.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner
